AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Display column

AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The List Price Max Margin indicates the maximum margin for a product. The margin is calculated by subtracting the original list price from the newly calculated price. If this field contains 0.00 then it is ignored.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Only Discount
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Include only invoices where we would get payment discount

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Movement Quantity
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Movement Quantity indicates the quantity of a product that has been moved.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Movement Type
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Movement Type indicates the type of movement (in, out, to production, etc)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Approve own Documents
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Users with this role can approve their own documents
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If a user cannot approve their own documents (orders, etc.), it needs to be approved by someone else.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Product Asset

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Total Credit

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Remote Addr

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Version

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Start Date

Example: You have a US and a FR organization. The primary accounting schema is in USD, the second in EUR. AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If Automatic Period Control is enabled, the current period is calculated based on the system date and you can always post to all days in the current period. History Days enable to post to previous periods. E.g. today is May 15th and History Days is set to 30, you can post back to April 15th

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Journal

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: On Hand Quantity
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The On Hand Quantity indicates the quantity of a product that is on hand in a warehouse.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Default Logic 2
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The defaults are evaluated in the order of definition, the first not null value becomes the default value of the column. The values are separated by comma or semicolon. a) Literals:. 'Text' or 123 b) Variables - in format @Variable@ - Login e.g. #Date, #AD_Org_ID, #AD_Client_ID - Accounting Schema: e.g. $C_AcctSchema_ID, $C_Calendar_ID - Global defaults: e.g. DateFormat - Window values (all Picks, CheckBoxes, RadioButtons, and DateDoc/DateAcct) c) SQL code with the tag: @SQL=SELECT something AS DefaultValue FROM ... The SQL statement can contain variables. There can be no other value other than the SQL statement. The default is only evaluated, if no user preference is defined. Default definitions are ignored for record columns as Key, Parent, Client as well as Buttons.

AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If selected, a line is painted above and below the header line using the stroke information

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Line Stroke
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The width of the line stroke (line thickness) in Points.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Document Sequence
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Document sequence determines the numbering of documents
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Document Sequence indicates the sequencing rule to use for this document type.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Document Status
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The current status of the document
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Document Status indicates the status of a document at this time. If you want to change the document status, use the Document Action field

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Procedure
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Procedure indicates the name of the database procedure called by this report or process.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Cost per transaction
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Cost per Transaction indicates the fixed cost per to be charged per transaction.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Ratio
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The relative weight of an distribution. If the total of all ratios is 100, it is the same as percent.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Substitute
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Entity which can be used in place of this entity
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Substitute identifies the entity to be used as a substitute for this entity.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Exp. Month
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Expiry Month indicates the expiry month for this credit card.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Tax Liability
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Tax Liability Account indicates the account used to record your tax liability declaration.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Request Folder
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: EMail folder to process incoming emails; if empty INBOX is used
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Email folder used to read emails to process as requests, If left empty the default mailbox (INBOX) will be used. Requires IMAP services.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Request User
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: User Name (ID) of the email owner
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: EMail user name for requests, alerts and escalation are sent from this email address as well as delivery information if the sales rep does not have an email account. Required, if your mail server requires authentification as well as for processing incoming mails.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: UOM for Time
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Standard Unit of Measure for Time
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Standard UOM for Time indicates the UOM to use for products referenced by time in a document.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Approved
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Indicates if this document requires approval
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Approved checkbox indicates if this document requires approval before it can be processed.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Limit price Surcharge Amount
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Amount added to the converted/copied price before multiplying
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Indicates the amount to be added to the Limit price prior to multiplication.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Grace Days
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Days after due date to send first dunning letter
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Grace Days indicates the number of days after the due date to send the first dunning letter. This field displays only if the send dunning letters checkbox has been selected.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Y Position
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Absolute Y (vertical) position in 1/72 of an inch
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Absolute Y (vertical) position in 1/72 of an inch

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Menu
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Menu identifies a unique Menu. Menus are used to control the display of those screens a user has access to.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Conversion Date
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Conversion Date identifies the date used for currency conversion. The conversion rate chosen must include this date in it's date range

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: ISO Language Code
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The ISO Language Code indicates the standard ISO code for a language in lower case. Information can be found at http://www.ics.uci.edu/pub/ietf/http/related/iso639.txt

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Country has Region
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Country has Region checkbox is selected if the Country being defined is divided into regions. If this checkbox is selected, the Region Tab is accessible.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Days due
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Number of days due (negative: due in number of days)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Online Processing
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: This payment can be processed online
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Online Processing indicates if the payment can be processed online.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Price List Version
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Identifies a unique instance of a Price List
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Each Price List can have multiple versions. The most common use is to indicate the dates that a Price List is valid for.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Location To
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Location that inventory was moved to
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Location To indicates the location that a product was moved to.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Discount Days
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Number of days from invoice date to be eligible for discount
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Discount Days indicates the number of days that payment must be received in to be eligible for the stated discount.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Frequency
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The frequency is used in conjunction with the frequency type in determining an event. Example: If the Frequency Type is Week and the Frequency is 2 - it is every two weeks.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Frequency Type
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The frequency type is used for calculating the date of the next event.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Valid from
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Valid from including this date (first day)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Valid From date indicates the first day of a date range

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Sequence
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Sequence defines the numbering sequence to be used for documents.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Tab
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Tab indicates a tab that displays within a window.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Average Cost Amount Sum
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Current cumulative costs for calculating the average costs

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Combination
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Combination identifies a valid combination of element which represent a GL account.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Not-invoiced Receivables
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Not Invoiced Receivables account indicates the account used for recording receivables that have not yet been invoiced.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Print Format Item
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Item/Column in the print format maintaining layout information

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Dunning Print Format
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Print Format for printing Dunning Letters
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: You need to define a Print Format to print the document.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Invoice Print Format
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: You need to define a Print Format to print the document.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Order Print Format
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Print Format for Orders, Quotes, Offers
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: You need to define a Print Format to print the document.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Remittance Print Format
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: You need to define a Print Format to print the document.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Shipment Print Format
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Print Format for Shipments, Receipts, Pick Lists
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: You need to define a Print Format to print the document.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Multiplier Amount
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Multiplier Amount indicates the amount to multiply the total amount generated by this commission run by.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Inter-Organization
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Inter Organization field identifies an Organization which can be used by this Organization for intercompany documents.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: OS Task
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Task field identifies a Operation System Task in the system.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Updateable
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Determines, if the field can be updated
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Updateable checkbox indicates if a field can be updated by the user.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Price
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Price Entered - the price based on the selected/base UoM
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The price entered is converted to the actual price based on the UoM conversion

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Quantity
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The Quantity Entered is based on the selected UoM
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Quantity Entered is converted to base product UoM quantity

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Address 2
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Address 2 provides additional address information for an entity. It can be used for building location, apartment number or similar information.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Line Discount %
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Line Discount Percent indicates the discount for this line as a percentage.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Line Discount
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Indicates the discount for this line as an amount.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: EMU Entry Date
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Date when the currency joined / will join the EMU
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The EMU Entry Date defines the date that this currency entered, or will enter the Economic Monetary Union.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: (Not Used)
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Warehouse Inventory Asset Account - Currently not used
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Warehouse Inventory Asset Account identifies the account used for recording the value of your inventory. This is the counter account for inventory revaluation differences. The Product Asset account maintains the product asset value.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Due type
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Status of the next action for this Request
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Due Type indicates if this request is Due, Overdue or Scheduled.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Sales Transaction
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Sales Transaction checkbox indicates if this item is a Sales Transaction.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Start Implementation/Production
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The day you started the implementation (if implementing) - or production (went life) with Adempiere

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Document No
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Document sequence number of the document
AD_ELEMENT.HELP:
The document number is usually automatically generated by the system and determined by the document type of the document. If the document is not saved, the preliminary number is displayed in "<>".
If the document type of your document has no automatic document sequence defined, the field is empty if you create a new document. This is for documents which usually have an external number (like vendor invoice). If you leave the field empty, the system will generate a document number for you. The document sequence used for this fallback number is defined in the "Maintain Sequence" window with the name "DocumentNo_<TableName>", where TableName is the actual name of the table (e.g. C_Order).

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Locator
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Locator indicates where in a Warehouse a product is located.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Length
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Length of the column in the database
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Length indicates the length of a column as defined in the database.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Limit price max Margin
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Maximum difference to original limit price; ignored if zero
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Indicates the maximum margin for a product. The margin is calculated by subtracting the original limit price from the newly calculated price. If this field contains 0.00 then it is ignored.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: User updateable
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The field can be updated by the user
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The User Updateable checkbox indicate if the user can update this field.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Warehouse Differences
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Warehouse Differences Account indicates the account used recording differences identified during inventory counts.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Bank Interest Revenue
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Bank Interest Revenue Account identifies the account to be used for recording interest revenue from this Bank.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Accept Direct Deposit
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Indicates if Direct Deposits (wire transfers, etc.) are accepted. Direct Deposits are initiated by the payee.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Credit Used
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Credit Used indicates the total amount of open or unpaid invoices in primary accounting currency for the Business Partner. Credit Management is based on the Total Open Amount, which includes Vendor activities.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Value Format
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Format of the value; Can contain fixed format elements, Variables: "_lLoOaAcCa09"
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Validation elements: (Space) any character _ Space (fixed character) l any Letter a..Z NO space L any Letter a..Z NO space converted to upper case o any Letter a..Z or space O any Letter a..Z or space converted to upper case a any Letters & Digits NO space A any Letters & Digits NO space converted to upper case c any Letters & Digits or space C any Letters & Digits or space converted to upper case 0 Digits 0..9 NO space 9 Digits 0..9 or space Example of format "(000)_000-0000"

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Minimum Order Qty
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Minimum Order Quantity indicates the smallest quantity of this product which can be ordered.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Discount Days 2
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Number of days from invoice date to be eligible for discount
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Discount Days indicates the number of days that payment must be received in to be eligible for the stated discount.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Period Action
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Period Action indicates the action to be taken for this period. For example 'Close Period' or 'Open Period'.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Days after due date
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Days after due date to dun (if negative days until due)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Days After Due Date indicates the number of days after the payment due date to initiate dunning. If the number is negarive, it includes not the not due invoices.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Date Promised
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Date Promised indicates the date, if any, that an Order was promised for.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: List price min Margin
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The List Price Min Margin indicates the minimum margin for a product. The margin is calculated by subtracting the original list price from the newly calculated price. If this field contains 0.00 then it is ignored.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: List price Rounding
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Rounding rule for final list price
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The List Price Rounding indicates how the final list price will be rounded.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Quantity count
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Quantity Count indicates the actual inventory count taken for a product in inventory

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Role
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Role determines security and access a user who has this Role will have in the System.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Shipment/Receipt
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Material Shipment / Receipt

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Shipment/Receipt Line
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Line on Shipment or Receipt document
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Shipment/Receipt Line indicates a unique line in a Shipment/Receipt document

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Period Status
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Period Status indicates the current status for this period. For example 'Closed', 'Open', 'Never Opened'.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Period Type
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Period Type indicates the type (Standard or Adjustment) of period.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Intercompany Due From Acct
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Intercompany Due From account indicates the account that represents money owed to this organization from other organizations.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Parent
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Parent indicates the value used to represent the next level in a hierarchy or report to level for a record

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Category Type
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Source of the Journal with this category
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Category Type indicates the source of the journal for this category. Journals can be generated from a document, entered manually or imported.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Address Print Format
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Address Print format defines the format to be used when this address prints. The following notations are used: @C@=City @P@=Postal @A@=PostalAdd @R@=Region

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Divide Rate
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: To convert Source number to Target number, the Source is divided
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: To convert Source number to Target number, the Source is divided by the divide rate. If you enter a Divide Rate, the Multiply Rate will be automatically calculated.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: List price Base
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Price used as the basis for price list calculations
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The List Price Base indicates the price to use as the basis for the calculation of a new price list.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Summary Level
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: A summary entity represents a branch in a tree rather than an end-node. Summary entities are used for reporting and do not have own values.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Exp. Year
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Expiry Year indicates the expiry year for this credit card.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Sql ORDER BY
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The ORDER BY Clause indicates the SQL ORDER BY clause to use for record selection

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Image URL
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: URL of image; The image is not stored in the database, but retrieved at runtime. The image can be a gif, jpeg or png.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Write-off
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Write Off Account identifies the account to book write off transactions to.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Delivery Via
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: How the order will be delivered
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Delivery Via indicates how the products should be delivered. For example, will the order be picked up or shipped.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Fix amount
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Fix amounted amount to be levied or paid
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Fixed Amount indicates a fixed amount to be levied or paid.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Data Format
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Format String in Java Notation, e.g. ddMMyy
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Date Format indicates how dates are defined on the record to be imported. It must be in Java Notation

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Account No
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Account Number indicates the Number assigned to this bank account.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Limit price Rounding
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: A drop down list box which indicates the rounding (if any) will apply to the final prices in this price list.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Payment amount
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Indicates the amount this payment is for. The payment amount can be for single or multiple invoices or a partial payment for an invoice.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Charge Revenue
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Charge Revenue Account identifies the account to use when recording charges paid by customers.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: List price Surcharge Amount
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The List Price Surcharge Amount indicates the amount to be added to the price prior to multiplication.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Standard price Discount %
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Discount percentage to subtract from base price
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Standard Price Discount Percentage indicates the percentage discount which will be subtracted from the base price. A negative amount indicates the percentage which will be added to the base price.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Request
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Request from a Business Partner or Prospect
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Request identifies a unique request from a Business Partner or Prospect.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Allocation Line
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Allocation of Cash/Payment to Invoice

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Potential Life Time Value
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Potential Life Time Value is the anticipated revenue in primary accounting currency to be generated by the Business Partner.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Price Precision
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Precision (number of decimals) for the Price
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The prices of the price list are rounded to the precision entered. This allows to have prices with below currency precision, e.g. $0.005. Enter the number of decimals or -1 for no rounding.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Employee Expense
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Employee Expense Account identifies the account to use for recording expenses for this employee.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: From EMail
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Full EMail address used to send requests - e.g. edi@organization.com

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: From EMail Password
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Password of the sending EMail address

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: From EMail User ID
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: User ID of the sending EMail address (on default SMTP Host) - e.g. edi

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Prorate tax
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Prorate Tax checkbox indicates if this tax is prorated.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Invoice on even weeks
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Invoice on Even Weeks checkbox indicates if biweekly invoices should be sent on even week numbers.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Natural Account
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The natural account is often based on (industry specific) chart of accounts

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: GL Distribution
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If the account combination criteria of the Distribution is met, the posting to the account combination is replaced by the account combinations of the distribution lines. The distribution is prorated based on the ratio of the lines. The distribution must be valid to be used.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: SO Sub Type
AD_ELEMENT.HELP:
The SO Sub Type indicates the type of sales order this document refers to. This field only appears when the Document Base Type is Sales Order. The selection made here will determine which documents will be generated when an order is processed and which documents must be generated manually or in batches.
The following outlines this process.
SO Sub Type of Standard Order will generate just the Order document when the order is processed.
The Delivery Note, Invoice and Receipt must be generated via other processes.
SO Sub Type of Warehouse Order will generate the Order and Delivery Note.
The Invoice and Receipt must be generated via other processes.
SO Sub Type of Credit Order will generate the Order, Delivery Note and Invoice.
The Reciept must be generated via other processes.
SO Sub Type of POS (Point of Sale) will generate all document

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Authorization Code
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Authorization Code indicates the code returned from the electronic transmission.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Document Date
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Document Date indicates the date the document was generated. It may or may not be the same as the accounting date.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Last PO Price
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Price of the last purchase order for the product
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Last PO Price indicates the last price paid (per the purchase order) for this product.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Date last run
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Date the process was last run.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Date Last Run indicates the last time that a process was run.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Element Separator
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Element Separator defines the delimiter printed between elements of the structure

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Sequence
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Method of ordering records; lowest number comes first
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Sequence indicates the order of records

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Serial No
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Serial Number identifies a tracked, warranted product. It can only be used when the quantity is 1.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Number of Inventory counts
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Frequency of inventory counts per year
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Number of Inventory Counts indicates the number of times per year that inventory counts will be preformed

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Temporary exempt
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Temporary Exempt checkbox indicates that for a limited time, taxes will not be withheld for this employee.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Unrealized Loss Acct
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Unrealized Loss Account for currency revaluation
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Unrealized Loss Account indicates the account to be used when recording losses incurred from currency revaluation that have yet to be realized.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Updated
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Updated field indicates the date that this record was updated.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: BOM Quantity
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The BOM Quantity indicates the quantity of the product in its Unit of Measure (multiplication)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Non Business Day
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Day on which business is not transacted
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Non Business Day identifies a day that should not be considered a day when business is transacted

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Payment Term
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Payment Terms identify the method and timing of payment.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Period
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Period indicates an exclusive range of dates for a calendar.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Graph
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Pie/Line Graph to be printed in Reports

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Print Table Format
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Print Table Format determines Fonts, Colors of the printed Table

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Interest Amount
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Interest Amount indicates any interest charged or received on a Bank Statement.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Share
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Share of Customer's business as a percentage
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Share indicates the percentage of this Business Partner's volume of the products supplied.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Charge amount
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Charge Amount indicates the amount for an additional charge.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Charge fee
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Indicates if fees will be charged for overdue invoices
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Charge Fee checkbox indicates if the dunning letter will include fees for overdue invoices

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Charge Interest
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Indicates if interest will be charged on overdue invoices
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Charge Interest checkbox indicates if interest will be charged on overdue invoice amounts.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Classification
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Classification can be used to optionally group products.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Vendor Liability
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Vendor Liability account indicates the account used for recording transactions for vendor liabilities

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Verified
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The BOM configuration has been verified
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Verified check box indicates if the configuration of this product has been verified. This is used for products that consist of a bill of materials

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Price List
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Unique identifier of a Price List
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Price Lists are used to determine the pricing, margin and cost of items purchased or sold.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Not-invoiced Receipts
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Not Invoiced Receipts account indicates the account used for recording receipts for materials that have not yet been invoiced.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Order Description
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Description to be used on orders
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Order Description identifies the standard description to use on orders for this Customer.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Price Reimbursed
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The reimbursed price (in currency of the employee's AP price list)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The reimbursed price is derived from the converted price and can be overwritten when approving the expense report.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: System Language
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The screens, etc. are maintained in this Language
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Select, if you want to have translated screens available in this language. Please notify your system administrator to run the language maintenance scripts to enable the use of this language. If the language is not supplied, you can translate the terms yourself.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Total Lines
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Total amount displays the total of all lines in document currency

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Type | Area
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Element this tree is built on (i.e Product, Business Partner)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Tree Type / Area field determines the type of tree this is. For example, you may define one tree for your Products and another tree for your Business Partners.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Mail Host
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Hostname of Mail Server for SMTP and IMAP
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The host name of the Mail Server for this client with SMTP services to send mail, and IMAP to process incoming mail.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Cost per Order
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Cost Per Order indicates the fixed charge levied when an order for this product is placed.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Actual Delivery Time
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Actual days between order and delivery
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Actual Delivery Time indicates the number of days elapsed between placing an order and the delivery of the order

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Promised Delivery Time
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Promised days between order and delivery
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Promised Delivery Time indicates the number of days between the order date and the date that delivery was promised.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: BPartner Tree
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Tree to determine business partner hierarchy
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Trees are used for (finanial) reporting

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Message Type
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Type of message (Informational, Menu or Error)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Message Type indicates the type of message being defined. Valid message types are Informational, Menu and Error.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: UOM for Length
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Standard Unit of Measure for Length
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Standard UOM for Length indicates the UOM to use for products referenced by length in a document.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Commission only specified Orders
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Commission only Orders or Invoices, where this Sales Rep is entered
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Sales Reps are entered in Orders and Invoices. If selected, only Orders and Invoices for this Sales Reps are included in the calculation of the commission.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Order
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Order is a control document. The Order is complete when the quantity ordered is the same as the quantity shipped and invoiced. When you cloase an order, unshipped (backordered) quantities are cancelled.
AD_ELEMENT.PO_HELP: The Purchase Order is a control document. The Purchase Order is complete when the quantity ordered is the same as the quantity shipped and invoiced. When you cloase an order, unshipped (backordered) quantities are cancelled.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: UOM Conversion
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The UOM Conversion identifies a unique to and from Unit of Measure, conversion rate and conversion date range.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: UOM
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The UOM defines a unique non monetary Unit of Measure

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Type
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Type of Validation (SQL, Java Script, Java Language)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Type indicates the type of validation that will occur. This can be SQL, Java Script or Java Language.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Account Date
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Accounting Date indicates the date to be used on the General Ledger account entries generated from this document. It is also used for any currency conversion.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Symbol
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Symbol for a Unit of Measure
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Symbol identifies the Symbol to be displayed and printed for a Unit of Measure

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Security enabled
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: If security is enabled, user access to data can be restricted via Roles
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Security Enabled checkbox indicates that user access to the data in this table can be restricted using Roles.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Base Price List
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Base Price List identifies the Base Pricelist used for calculating prices (the source)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Tax Category
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Tax Category provides a method of grouping similar taxes. For example, Sales Tax or Value Added Tax.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Write-off Amount
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Write Off Amount indicates the amount to be written off as uncollectible.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Cash Book
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Cash Book for recording petty cash transactions
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Cash Book identifies a unique cash book. The cash book is used to record cash transactions.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Current Next
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The next number to be used
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Current Next indicates the next number to use for this document

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Document Action
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The targeted status of the document
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: You find the current status in the Document Status field. The options are listed in a popup

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: WindowType
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Type or classification of a Window
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Window Type indicates the type of window being defined (Maintain, Transaction or Query)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Delivery Rule
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Delivery Rule indicates when an order should be delivered. For example should the order be delivered when the entire order is complete, when a line is complete or as the products become available.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Used for Record ID
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The document number will be used as the record key
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Used for Record ID checkbox indicates if the document id will be used as the key to the record

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Result
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Result indicates the result of any action taken on this request.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Total Debit
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Total Debit indicates the total debit amount for a journal or journal batch in the source currency

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: PO Number
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The PO Number indicates the number assigned to a purchase order

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Price
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Price indicates the Price for a product or service.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Limit price Base
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Base price for calculation of the new price
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Identifies the price to be used as the base for calculating a new price list.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Unallocated Cash
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Receipts not allocated to Invoices

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: After Delivery
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Due after delivery rather than after invoicing
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The After Delivery checkbox indicates that payment is due after delivery as opposed to after invoicing.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Year
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Year identifies the Calendar year

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Units Per Pallet
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Units per Pallet indicates the number of units of this product which fit on a pallet.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Unrealized Gain Acct
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Unrealized Gain Account for currency revaluation
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Unrealized Gain Account indicates the account to be used when recording gains achieved from currency revaluation that have yet to be realized.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Source Credit
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Source Credit Amount indicates the credit amount for this line in the source currency.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Shelf Depth
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Shelf Depth indicates the depth dimension required on a shelf for a product

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Shelf Height
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Shelf Height indicates the height dimension required on a shelf for a product

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Bank Account
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Bank Account identifies an account at this Bank.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Document Copies
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Number of copies to be printed
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Document Copies indicates the number of copies of each document that will be generated.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Report View
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: View used to generate this report
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Report View indicates the view used to generate this report.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Invoice day cut-off
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Invoice Day Cut Off indicates the last day for shipments to be included in the current invoice schedule. For example, if the invoice schedule is defined for the first day of the month, the cut off day may be the 25th of the month. An shipment on the 24th of May would be included in the invoices sent on June 1st but a shipment on the 26th would be included in the invoices sent on July 1st.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Greeting
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: For letters, e.g. "Dear {0}" or "Dear Mr. {0}" - At runtime, "{0}" is replaced by the name
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Greeting indicates what will print on letters sent to a Business Partner.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Sales Order Line
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Sales Order Line is a unique identifier for a line in an order.
AD_ELEMENT.PO_HELP: The Purchase Order Line is a unique identifier for a line in an order.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Standard Price
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Standard Price indicates the standard or normal price for a product on this price list

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Bank Revaluation Gain
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Bank Revaluation Gain Account identifies the account to be used for recording gains that are recognized when converting currencies.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Record Sort No
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Determines in what order the records are displayed
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Record Sort No indicates the ascending sort sequence of the records. If the number is negative, the records are sorted descending. Example: A tab with C_DocType_ID (1), DocumentNo (-2) will be sorted ascending by document type and descending by document number (SQL: ORDER BY C_DocType, DocumentNo DESC)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Actual Life Time Value
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Actual Life Time Value is the recorded revenue in primary accounting currency generated by the Business Partner.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Reference No
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Your customer or vendor number at the Business Partner's site
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The reference number can be printed on orders and invoices to allow your business partner to faster identify your records.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Freight Amount
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Freight Amount indicates the amount charged for Freight in the document currency.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: GAAP
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The GAAP identifies the account principles that this accounting schema will adhere to.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Budget
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The General Ledger Budget identifies a user defined budget. These can be used in reporting as a comparison against your actual amounts.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Attachment
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Attachment can be of any document/file type and can be attached to any record in the system.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Source Debit
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Source Debit Amount indicates the credit amount for this line in the source currency.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Next action
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Next Action indicates the next action to be taken on this request.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Priority
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Indicates if this request is of a high, medium or low priority.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Priority indicates the importance of this request.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Default Logic
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The defaults are evaluated in the order of definition, the first not null value becomes the default value of the column. The values are separated by comma or semicolon. a) Literals:. 'Text' or 123 b) Variables - in format @Variable@ - Login e.g. #Date, #AD_Org_ID, #AD_Client_ID - Accounting Schema: e.g. $C_AcctSchema_ID, $C_Calendar_ID - Global defaults: e.g. DateFormat - Window values (all Picks, CheckBoxes, RadioButtons, and DateDoc/DateAcct) c) SQL code with the tag: @SQL=SELECT something AS DefaultValue FROM ... The SQL statement can contain variables. There can be no other value other than the SQL statement. The default is only evaluated, if no user preference is defined. Default definitions are ignored for record columns as Key, Parent, Client as well as Buttons.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Rate
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Rate indicates the percentage to be multiplied by the source to arrive at the tax or exchange amount.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Tax Indicator
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Short form for Tax to be printed on documents
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Tax Indicator identifies the short name that will print on documents referencing this tax.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Transaction Amount
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Transaction Amount indicates the amount for a single transaction.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: ACH
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The ACH checkbox indicates if this Bank Account accepts ACH transactions.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Manual
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Manual check box indicates if the process will done manually.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Reversal
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Reversal check box indicates if this is a reversal of a prior transaction.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Year
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Year uniquely identifies an accounting year for a calendar.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Currency Balancing Acct
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Account used when a currency is out of balance
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Currency Balancing Account indicates the account to used when a currency is out of balance (generally due to rounding)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Rate
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Currency Conversion Rate indicates the rate to use when converting the source currency to the accounting currency

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Public
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If selected, public users can read/view the entry. Public are users without a Role in the system. Use security rules for more specic access control.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Charges
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Charges can be added to the document
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Charges checkbox indicates that charges can be added to this document. Charges can include items like shipping, handling or bank charges.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: GL Distribution Line
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If the account combination criteria of the Distribution is met, the posting to the account combination is replaced by the account combinations of the distribution lines. The distribution is prorated based on the ratio of the lines.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Template B.Partner
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Business Partner used for creating new Business Partners on the fly
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: When creating a new Business Partner from the Business Partner Search Field (right-click: Create), the selected business partner is used as a template, e.g. to define price list, payment terms, etc.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Document Type
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Document Type determines document sequence and processing rules

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Search Key
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Search key for the record in the format required - must be unique
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: A search key allows you a fast method of finding a particular record. If you leave the search key empty, the system automatically creates a numeric number. The document sequence used for this fallback number is defined in the "Maintain Sequence" window with the name "DocumentNo_<TableName>", where TableName is the actual name of the table (e.g. C_Order).

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Partner Category
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Product Category of the Business Partner
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Business Partner Category identifies the category used by the Business Partner for this product.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Transferred
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The transferred checkbox indicates if the transactions associated with this document should be transferred to the General Ledger.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Translated
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Translated checkbox indicates if this column is translated.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Service Level
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Service Level defines a unique Service Level.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Posted
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Posted field indicates the status of the Generation of General Ledger Accounting Lines

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Available
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Resource is available for assignments

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Document Controlled
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Control account - If an account is controlled by a document, you cannot post manually to it

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Bank Unidentified Receipts
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Bank Unidentified Receipts Account identifies the account to be used when recording receipts that can not be reconciled at the present time.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Relative Weight
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Relative weight of this step (0 = ignored)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The relative weight allows you to adjust the project cycle report based on probabilities. For example, if you have a 1:10 chance in closing a contract when it is in the prospect stage and a 1:2 chance when it is in the contract stage, you may put a weight of 0.1 and 0.5 on those steps. This allows sales funnels or measures of completion of your project.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Last Contact
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Date this individual was last contacted
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Last Contact indicates the date that this Business Partner Contact was last contacted.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Total Ratio
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Total of relative weight in a distribution
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The total relative weight of an distribution. If the total of all ratios is 100, it is the same as percent.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Access Log
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Log of Access to the System

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Organization
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: An organization is a unit of your client or legal entity - examples are store, department.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Price effective
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Price Effective indicates the date this price is for. This allows you to enter future prices for products which will become effective when appropriate.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Over/Under Payment
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Overpayments (negative) are unallocated amounts and allow you to receive money for more than the particular invoice. Underpayments (positive) is a partial payment for the invoice. You do not write off the unpaid amount.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Relative Position
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The item is relative positioned (not absolute)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The relative positioning of the item is determined by X-Z space and next line

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Field Group
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Field Group indicates the logical group that this field belongs to (History, Amounts, Quantities)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Date last action
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Date this request was last acted on
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Date Last Action indicates that last time that the request was acted on.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Send dunning letters
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Indicates if dunning letters will be sent
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Send Dunning Letters checkbox indicates if dunning letters will be sent to Business Partners who use this dunning rule.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Discount calculated from Line Amounts
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Payment Discount calculation does not include Taxes and Charges
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If the payment discount is calculated from line amounts only, the tax and charge amounts are not included. This is e.g. business practice in the US. If not selected the total invoice amount is used to calculate the payment discount.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Invoice Rule
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Invoice Rule defines how a Business Partner is invoiced and the frequency of invoicing.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Document Level
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Tax is calculated on document level (rather than line by line)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If the tax is calculated on document level, all lines with that tax rate are added before calculating the total tax for the document. Otherwise the tax is calculated per line and then added. Due to rounding, the tax amount can differ.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Fixed due date
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Payment is due on a fixed date
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Fixed Due Date checkbox indicates if invoices using this payment tern will be due on a fixed day of the month.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Foreign Currency Account
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Balances in foreign currency accounts are held in the nominated currency
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Balances in foreign currency accounts are held in the nominated currency and translated to functional currency

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Standard Cost
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Standard (plan) costs.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Costing Precision
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Costing Precision defines the number of decimal places that amounts will be rounded to when performing costing calculations.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Costs
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Costs indicates the cost of a campaign in an Organizations accounting currency.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: ISO Country Code
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Upper-case two-letter alphanumeric ISO Country code according to ISO 3166-1 - http://www.chemie.fu-berlin.de/diverse/doc/ISO_3166.html
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: For details - http://www.din.de/gremien/nas/nabd/iso3166ma/codlstp1.html or - http://www.unece.org/trade/rec/rec03en.htm

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Created
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Created field indicates the date that this record was created.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Date next run
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Date the process will run next
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Date Next Run indicates the next time this process will run.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Date printed
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Indicates the Date that a document was printed.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Restart sequence every Year
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Restart the sequence with Start on every 1/1
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Restart Sequence Every Year checkbox indicates that the documents sequencing should return to the starting number on the first day of the year.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Product Revenue
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Product Revenue Account indicates the account used for recording sales revenue for this product.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Project Asset
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Project Asset account is the account used as the final asset account in capital projects

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Processed
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Processed checkbox indicates that a document has been processed.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Quantity book
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Quantity Book indicates the line count stored in the system for a product in inventory

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Match PO
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Match Purchase Order to Shipment/Receipt and Invoice
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The matching record is usually created automatically. If price matching is enabled on business partner group level, the matching might have to be approved.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Delete existing Accounting Entries
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The selected accounting entries will be deleted! DANGEROUS !!!

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Credit Available
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Available Credit based on Credit Limit (not Total Open Balance) and Credit Used

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Bank In Transit
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Bank in Transit Account identifies the account to be used for funds which are in transit.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Amount Limit
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Send invoices only if the amount exceeds the limit
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Amount Limit checkbox indicates if invoices will be sent out if they are below the entered limit.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Credit Approved
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Credit Approved indicates if the credit approval was successful for Orders

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Measure Actual
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Actual value that has been measured.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Measure Actual indicates the actual measured value. The measured values are used in determining if a performance goal has been met

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Measure Target
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Measure Target indicates the target or goal for this measure. It is used as in comparing against the actual measures

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Tax exempt
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Business partner is exempt from tax
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If a business partner is exempt from tax, the exempt tax rate is used. For this, you need to set up a tax rate with a 0% rate and indicate that this is your tax exempt rate. This is required for tax reporting, so that you can track tax exempt transactions.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Remit-To Address
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If the Remit-To Address is selected, the location is used to send payments to the vendor.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Registered EMail
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Email of the responsible for the System
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Email of the responsible person for the system (registered in WebStore)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Vendor ID
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Vendor ID for the Payment Processor

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Bank Account Document
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Bank documents, you generate or track

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: D-U-N-S
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Used for EDI - For details see www.dnb.com/dunsno/list.htm

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Y Space
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Relative Y (vertical) space in 1/72 of an inch
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Relative Y (vertical) space in 1/72 of an inch in relation to the end of the previous item.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Default
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Default Checkbox indicates if this record will be used as a default value.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Next Business Day
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Payment due on the next business day
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Next Business Day checkbox indicates that payment is due on the next business day after invoice or delivery.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Reconciled
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Payment is reconciled with bank statement

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Commission Amount
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Commission Amount indicates the resulting amount from a Commission Run.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Reference
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Payment Reference indicates the reference returned from the Credit Card Company for a payment

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Ship/Receipt Confirmation
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Confirmation of Shipment or Receipt - Created from the Shipment/Receipt

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Approval Amount
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Approval Amount for Workflow

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Activate Audit
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Activate Audit Trail of what numbers are generated
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Activate Audit checkbox indicates if an audit trail of numbers generated will be kept.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Web Counter
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Web Counter Details

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Lot No
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Lot Number indicates the specific lot that a product was part of.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Primary Accounting Schema
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: An Accounting Schema defines the rules used accounting such as costing method, currency and calendar.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: GL Category
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The General Ledger Category is an optional, user defined method of grouping journal lines.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Journal Batch
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The General Ledger Journal Batch identifies a group of journals to be processed as a group.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Shelf Width
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Shelf Width indicates the width dimension required on a shelf for a product

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Product Category
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Identifies the category which this product belongs to. Product categories are used for pricing and selection.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Product
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Identifies an item which is either purchased or sold in this organization.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Number of runs
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Number of Runs indicates the number of times that the Perpetual Inventory has be processed.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Document Type for Shipment
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Document type used for shipments generated from this sales document
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: he Document Type for Shipments indicates the document type that will be used when a shipment is generated from this sales document. This field will display only when the base document type is Sales Order.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Distribution Run
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Distribution Run create Orders to distribute products to a selected list of partners
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Distribution Run defines how Orders are created based on Distribution Lists

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Additional Postal Format
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Format of the value; Can contain fixed format elements, Variables: "_lLoOaAcCa09"
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Validation elements: (Space) any character _ Space (fixed character) l any Letter a..Z NO space L any Letter a..Z NO space converted to upper case o any Letter a..Z or space O any Letter a..Z or space converted to upper case a any Letters & Digits NO space A any Letters & Digits NO space converted to upper case c any Letters & Digits or space C any Letters & Digits or space converted to upper case 0 Digits 0..9 NO space 9 Digits 0..9 or space Example of format "(000)_000-0000"

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Print Text
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The label text to be printed on a document or correspondence.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Label to be printed indicates the name that will be printed on a document or correspondence. The max length is 2000 characters.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Area Code
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Phone Area Code

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: City
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: City in a country

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Commission Amount
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Commission Amount is the total calculated commission. It is based on the parameters as defined for this Commission Run.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Converted Amount
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Converted Amount is the result of multiplying the Source Amount by the Conversion Rate for this target currency.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Date Delivered
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Date when the product was delivered

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Standard Cost Invoice Difference
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Accumulated difference of Invoice Costs to Standard Costs

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Display Length
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Length of the display in characters
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The display length is mainly for String fields. The length has no impact, if the data type of the field is - Integer, Number, Amount (length determined by the system) - YesNo (Checkbox) - List, Table, TableDir (length of combo boxes are determined by their content at runtime)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Standard price Surcharge Amount
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Amount added to a price as a surcharge
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Standard Price Surcharge Amount indicates the amount to be added to the price prior to multiplication.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Standard price Base
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Base price for calculating new standard price
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Standard Price Base indicates the price to use as the basis for the calculation of a new price standard.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Quantity Invoiced
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Invoiced Quantity indicates the quantity of a product that have been invoiced.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Ordered Quantity
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Ordered Quantity indicates the quantity of a product that was ordered.
AD_ELEMENT.PO_HELP: The Ordered Quantity indicates the quantity of a product that was ordered.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Reserved Quantity
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Reserved Quantity indicates the quantity of a product that is currently reserved.
AD_ELEMENT.PO_HELP: The Ordered Quantity indicates the quantity of a product that is currently ordered.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Discount Printed
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Print Discount on Invoice and Order
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Discount Printed Checkbox indicates if the discount will be printed on the document.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Calculate Sum (?)
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Calculate the Sum of numeric content or length
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Calculate the Sum (?) of the data if the field is numeric, otherwise total sum length of the field.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Comment/Help
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Help field contains a hint, comment or help about the use of this item.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: ISDN
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The ISDN identifies a ISDN or Modem line number.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Acquisition Cost
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The cost of gaining the prospect as a customer
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Acquisition Cost identifies the cost associated with making this prospect a customer.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Invoice weekday cutoff
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Last day in the week for shipments to be included
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Invoice Week Day Cutoff indicates the last day of the week a shipment must be made to be included in the invoice schedule.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Count high turnover items
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Count High Movement checkbox indicates if the those items with a high turnover will be counted

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Invoice net Amount
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Indicates the net amount for this invoice. It does not include shipping or any additional charges.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Production Line
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Production Line indicates the production document line (if applicable) for this transaction

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Dynamic Validation
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: These rules define how an entry is determined to valid. You can use variables for dynamic (context sensitive) validation.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Contract Date
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The (planned) effective date of this document.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The contract date is used to determine when the document becomes effective. This is usually the contract date. The contract date is used in reports and report parameters.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Tender type
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Tender Type indicates the method of payment (ACH or Direct Deposit, Credit Card, Check, Direct Debit)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Measure Type
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Determines how the actual performance is derived
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Measure Type indicates how the actual measure is determined. For example, one measure may be manual while another is calculated.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Display Value
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Displays Value column with the Display column
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Display Value checkbox indicates if the value column will display with the display column.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Trade Discount Received
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Trade Discount Receivables Account indicates the account for received trade discounts in vendor invoices

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Inventory Adjustment
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Account for Inventory value adjustments for Actual Costing
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: In actual costing systems, this account is used to post Inventory value adjustments. You could set it to the standard Inventory Asset account.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: View
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: This is a view rather than a table. A view is always treated as read only in the system.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Supervisor
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Supervisor for this user/organization - used for escalation and approval
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Supervisor indicates who will be used for forwarding and escalating issues for this user - or for approvals.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Post Trade Discount
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If the invoice is based on an item with a list price, the amount based on the list price and the discount is posted instead of the net amount. Example: Quantity 10 - List Price: 20 - Actual Price: 17 If selected for a sales invoice 200 is posted to Product Revenue and 30 to Discount Granted - rather than 170 to Product Revenue. The same applies to vendor invoices.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Comments
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Comments field allows for free form entry of additional information.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Coordinates
AD_ELEMENT.HELP:
This column contains the geographical coordinates (latitude/longitude) of the location.

In order to avoid unnecessary use of non-standard characters and space, the following standard presentation is used:
0000N 00000W 0000S 00000E
where the two last digits refer to minutes and the two or three first digits indicate the degrees

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Locode
AD_ELEMENT.HELP:
UN/Locode is a combination of a 2-character country code and a 3-character location code, e.g. BEANR is known as the city of Antwerp (ANR) which is located in Belgium (BE).

See: http://www.unece.org/cefact/locode/service/main.htm

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Forecast Line
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Forecast of Product Qyantity by Period

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Tab Level
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Hierarchical level of the tab. If the level is 0, it is the top entity. Level 1 entries are dependent on level 0, etc.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Statement date
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Statement Date field defines the date of the statement.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Maximum Level
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Maximum Inventory level for this product
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Indicates the maximum quantity of this product to be stocked in inventory.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Minimum Level
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Minimum Inventory level for this product
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Indicates the minimum quantity of this product to be stocked in inventory.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Goal
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Performance Goal indicates what this users performance will be measured against.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Start No
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Start Number indicates the starting position in the line or field number in the line

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Production Plan
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Plan for how a product is produced
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Production Plan identifies the items and steps in generating a product.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Charge Expense
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Charge Expense Account identifies the account to use when recording charges paid to vendors.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Cycle Step
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Identifies one or more steps within a Project Cycle. A cycle Step has multiple Phases

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Tax base Amount
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Base for calculating the tax amount
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Tax Base Amount indicates the base amount used for calculating the tax amount.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: UPC/EAN
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Bar Code (Universal Product Code or its superset European Article Number)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Use this field to enter the bar code for the product in any of the bar code symbologies (Codabar, Code 25, Code 39, Code 93, Code 128, UPC (A), UPC (E), EAN-13, EAN-8, ITF, ITF-14, ISBN, ISSN, JAN-13, JAN-8, POSTNET and FIM, MSI/Plessey, and Pharmacode)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Workflow
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Workflow field identifies a unique Workflow in the system.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Discount Amount
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Discount Amount indicates the discount amount for a document or line.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Ending balance
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Ending Balance is the result of adjusting the Beginning Balance by any payments or disbursements.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Work In Progress
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Work in Process account is the account used in capital projects until the project is completed

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Production Quantity
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Production Quantity identifies the number of products to produce

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Credit limit
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Credit Limit field indicates the credit limit for this account.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Centrally maintained
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Information maintained in System Element table
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Centrally Maintained checkbox indicates if the Name, Description and Help maintained in 'System Element' table or 'Window' table.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Expense Date
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Date of expense

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Report Date
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Date of Expense/Time Report

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Invoice
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Invoice Document.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Self-Service
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: This is a Self-Service entry or this entry can be changed via Self-Service
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Self-Service allows users to enter data or update their data. The flag indicates, that this record was entered or created via Self-Service or that the user can change it via the Self-Service functionality.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Amount Type
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: You can choose between the total and period amounts as well as the balance or just the debit/credit amounts.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Max Width
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Maximum Width in 1/72 if an inch - 0 = no restriction
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Maximum width of the element in 1/72 of an inch (point). If zero (0), there is no width restriction.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: X Position
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Absolute X (horizontal) position in 1/72 of an inch
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Absolute X (horizontal) position in 1/72 of an inch

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Process
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Process field identifies a unique Process or Report in the system.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Purchase Pricelist
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Price List used by this Business Partner
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Identifies the price list used by a Vendor for products purchased by this organization.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Payment Rule
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Payment Rule indicates the method of purchase payment.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Unit Price
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Actual or Unit Price indicates the Price for a product in source currency.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: List Price
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The List Price is the official List Price in the document currency.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Use Account Combination Control
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Combination of account elements are checked
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Combination Control checkbox indicates if the combination of account elements will be verified against the defined acceptable combination.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Increment
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The number to increment the last document number by
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Increment indicates the number to increment the last document number by to arrive at the next sequence number

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Number of Product counts
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Frequency of product counts per year
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Number of Product Count indicates the number of times per year that a product should be counted.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Note
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Note field allows for optional entry of user defined information regarding this record

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Quality Rating
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Quality Rating indicates how a vendor is rated (higher number = higher quality)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Standard Precision
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Standard Precision defines the number of decimal places that amounts will be rounded to for accounting transactions and documents.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Shipper
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Method or manner of product delivery
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Shipper indicates the method of delivering product

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Warehouse
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Warehouse identifies a unique Warehouse where products are stored or Services are provided.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Alias
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Defines an alternate method of indicating an account combination.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Alias field allows you to define a alternate method for referring to a full account combination. For example, the Account Receivable Account for Garden World may be aliased as GW_AR.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Accounted Credit
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Account Credit Amount indicates the transaction amount converted to this organization's accounting currency

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Accounted Debit
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Account Debit Amount indicates the transaction amount converted to this organization's accounting currency

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Approval Amount
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The approval amount limit for this role
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Approval Amount field indicates the amount limit this Role has for approval of documents.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Client
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: A Client is a company or a legal entity. You cannot share data between Clients. Tenant is a synonym for Client.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Account Street
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Street address of the Credit Card or Account holder
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Street Address of the Credit Card or Account holder.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Account Zip/Postal
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Zip Code of the Credit Card or Account Holder
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Zip Code of the Credit Card or Account Holder.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Footer Margin
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Margin of the Footer in 1/72 of an inch
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Distance from the bottom of the main content to the end of the printable page in 1/72 of an inch (point)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Column
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Link to the database column of the table

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Mandatory Withholding
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Mandatory Withholding checkbox indicates that monies must be withheld from this employee.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Level (Z)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Z dimension indicates the Level a product is located in.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Bank
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Bank is a unique identifier of a Bank for this Organization or for a Business Partner with whom this Organization transacts.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Manual Actual
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Manual Active identifies a manually entered actual measurement value.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Note
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Note allows for entry for additional information regarding a manual entry.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Host port
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Host Port identifies the port to communicate with the host.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Online Access
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Online Access check box indicates if the application can be accessed via the web.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Average Cost Quantity Sum
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Current cumulative quantity for calculating the average costs

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Simulation
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Performing the function is only simulated

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Standard Header/Footer
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The standard Header and Footer is used
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If the standard header is not used, it must be explicitly defined.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Table Based
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Table based columnar list reporting is invoked from the Window Report button

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Max Height
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Maximum Height in 1/72 if an inch - 0 = no restriction
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Maximum height of the element in 1/72 of an inch (point). If zero (0), there is no height restriction.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: B.Partner Column
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Fully qualified Business Partner key column (C_BPartner_ID)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Business Partner Column indicates the Business Partner to use when calculating this measurement

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Calculation Class
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Java Class for calculation, implementing Interface Measure
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Calculation Class indicates the Java Class used for calculating measures.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Date Column
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Date Column indicates the date to be used when calculating this measurement

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: X Space
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Relative X (horizontal) space in 1/72 of an inch
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Relative X (horizontal) space in 1/72 of an inch in relation to the end of the previous item.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Margin %
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Margin for a product as a percentage
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Margin indicates the margin for this product as a percentage of the limit price and selling price.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Image attached
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The image to be printed is attached to the record
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The image to be printed is stored in the database as attachment to this record. The image can be a gif, jpeg or png.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Control Amount
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: If not zero, the Debit amount of the document must be equal this amount
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If the control amount is zero, no check is performed. Otherwise the total Debit amount must be equal to the control amount, before the document is processed.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Charge
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Charge indicates a type of Charge (Handling, Shipping, Restocking)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Data Access Level
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Indicates the access level required for this record or process.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Element
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Account Element uniquely identifies an Account Type. These are commonly known as a Chart of Accounts.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Purchased
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Purchased check box indicates if this product is purchased by this organization.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Range
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The parameter is a range of values
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Range checkbox indicates that this parameter is a range of values.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Read Only
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Read Only indicates that this field may only be Read. It may not be updated.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Read Write
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Read Write indicates that this field may be read and updated.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Action
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Indicates the Action to be performed
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Action field is a drop down list box which indicates the Action to be performed for this Item.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Reference
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Reference could be a display type, list or table validation.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Project
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: A Project allows you to track and control internal or external activities.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Region
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Region identifies a unique Region for this Country.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Sales Region
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Sales Region indicates a specific area of sales coverage.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Statistic Seconds
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Internal statistics how many seconds a process took
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: For internal use

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Accept Language
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Language accepted based on browser information

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Ratio Element
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Individual calculation instruction for a ratio

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Operand
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Operand how data is calculated. If it is the first in the series, 'minus' will create a negative value, otherwise ignored.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Element Type
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Type of data used for the calculation

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Accrual
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Indicates if Accrual or Cash Based accounting will be used
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Accrual checkbox indicates if this accounting schema will use accrual based account or cash based accounting. The Accrual method recognizes revenue when the product or service is delivered. Cash based method recognizes income when then payment is received.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Maintain Statistics
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Mainatan and allow to transfer general statistics (number of clients, orgs, business partners, users, products, invoices) to get a better feeling for the application use. This information is not published.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Intercompany Due To Acct
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Intercompany Due To Account indicates the account that represents money owed to other organizations.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Invoice Day
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Invoice Day indicates the day of invoice generation. If twice monthly, the second time is 15 days after this day.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Invoice Frequency
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: How often invoices will be generated
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Invoice Frequency indicates the frequency of invoice generation for a Business Partner.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Budget Status
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Indicates the current status of this budget
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Budget Status indicates the current status of this budget (i.e Draft, Approved)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Pro forma Invoice
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Indicates if Pro Forma Invoices can be generated from this document
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Pro Forma Invoice checkbox indicates if pro forma invoices can be generated from this sales document. A pro forma invoice indicates the amount that will be due should an order be shipped.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Percent
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Percent indicates the percentage used.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Committed Amount
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The commitment amount is independent from the planned amount. You would use the planned amount for your realistic estimation, which might be higher or lower than the commitment amount.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Balancing
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: All transactions within an element value must balance (e.g. cost centers)
