AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Balancing checkbox indicates the this element must balance in each journal transaction. For example, if cost centers have been defined as an element which is balance then the debits and credits for each unique cost center must net to 0.00. This is commonly used to define parts of an organization which report as their own entity. Balancing is not an option for the Account element.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Fix month offset
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Fixed Month Offset indicates the number of months from the current month to indicate an invoice is due. A 0 indicates the same month, a 1 the following month. This field will only display if the fixed due date checkbox is selected.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Reference List
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Reference List field indicates a list of reference values from a database tables. Reference lists populate drop down list boxes in data entry screens

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: First name only
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Print only the first name in greetings
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The First Name Only checkbox indicates that only the first name of this contact should print in greetings.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: High Volume
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Use Search instead of Pick list
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The High Volume Checkbox indicates if a search screen will display as opposed to a pick list for selecting records from this table.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Sales Representative
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Sales Representative indicates the Sales Rep for this Region. Any Sales Rep must be a valid internal user.
AD_ELEMENT.PO_HELP: Purchase agent for the document. Any Sales Rep must be a valid internal user.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Ratio Used
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Existing Performance Ratio to be used in the calculation. Make sure that the Ratio is not self-referencing (loop).

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Accept Electronic Check
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Indicates if EChecks are accepted

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Perpetual Inventory
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Perpetual Inventory identifies the Perpetual Inventory rule which generated this Physical Inventory.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Bank Asset
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Bank Asset Account identifies the account to be used for booking changes to the balance in this bank account

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Entity Type
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Dictionary Entity Type; Determines ownership and synchronization
AD_ELEMENT.HELP:
The Entity Types "Dictionary", "Adempiere" and "Application" might be automatically synchronized and customizations deleted or overwritten.
For customizations, copy the entity and select "User"!

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Post Actual
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Post Actual indicates if actual values can be posted to this element value.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Post Budget
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Post Budget indicates if budget values can be posted to this element value.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Service Level Line
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Product Revenue Recognition Service Level Line
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Service Level Line indicates a unique instance in a Service Level

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Host Address
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Host Address identifies the URL or DNS of the target host

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: NAICS/SIC
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Standard Industry Code or its successor NAIC - http://www.osha.gov/oshstats/sicser.html
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The NAICS/SIC identifies either of these codes that may be applicable to this Business Partner.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Name
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The name of an entity (record) is used as an default search option in addition to the search key. The name is up to 60 characters in length.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Net Days
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Net Days in which payment is due
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Indicates the number of days after invoice date that payment is due.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Grand Total
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Grand Total displays the total amount including Tax and Freight in document currency

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Depreciate
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The asset is used internally and will be depreciated

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Days between dunning
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Days Between Dunning indicates the number of days between sending dunning notices.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: ISO Currency To Code
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Three letter ISO 4217 Code of the To Currency
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: For details - http://www.unece.org/trade/rec/rec09en.htm

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Payment Selection
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Payment Selection identifies a unique Payment

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Payment Selection Line
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Payment Selection Line identifies a unique line in a payment

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Payment date
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Payment Date indicates the date the payment was made.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: PO Window
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Window for Purchase Order (AP) Zooms

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Delete old imported records
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Before processing delete old imported records in the import table

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Locator To
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Locator To indicates the location where the inventory is being moved to.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Create Reciprocal Rate
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Create Reciprocal Rate from current information
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If selected, the imported USD->EUR rate is used to create/calculate the reciprocal rate EUR->USD.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: User Level
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The User Level field determines if users of this Role will have access to System level data, Organization level data, Client level data or Client and Organization level data.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Alert after Days Due
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Send email alert after number of days due (0=no alerts)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Send an email alert after the item is Due (after Date Next Action). If set to zero, no alert is sent.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Enforce price limit
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Do not allow prices below the limit price
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Enforce Price Limit check box indicates that prices cannot be below the limit price in Orders and Invoices. Ths can be overwritten, if the role allows this.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Exempt reason
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Exempt Reason indicates the reason that monies are not withheld from this employee.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Tax Receivables
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Account for Tax credit after tax declaration
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Tax Receivables Account indicates the account used to record the tax credit amount after your tax declaration.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Own Bank
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Own Bank field indicates if this bank is for this Organization as opposed to a Bank for a Business Partner.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Automatic Period Control
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: If selected, the periods are automatically opened and closed
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: In the Automatic Period Control, periods are opened and closed based on the current date. If the Manual alternative is activated, you have to open and close periods explicitly.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Invoice To
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Bill/Invoice To indicates the address to use when remitting bills
AD_ELEMENT.PO_HELP: The Bill/Invoice From indicated the address where the invoice is created by the vendor

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Discontinued
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: This product is no longer available
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Discontinued check box indicates a product that has been discontinued.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Budget Control
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Budget Control allows you to restrict the use of expenditures, commitments (Purchase Orders) and reservations (Requisitions). If defined, you mey not be able to approve Requisitions, Purchse Orders, or AP Invoices.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Order Pack Qty
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Package order size in UOM (e.g. order set of 5 units)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Order Pack Quantity indicates the number of units in each pack of this product.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Effective date
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Effective Date indicates the date that money is available from the bank.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Total Amount
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Total Amount indicates the total document amount.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Cash Book Expense
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Cash Book Expense Account identifies the account to be used for general, non itemized expenses.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Campaign
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Campaign defines a unique marketing program. Projects can be associated with a pre defined Marketing Campaign. You can then report based on a specific Campaign.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Channel
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Sales Channel identifies a channel (or method) of sales generation.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Cash Type
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Cash Type indicates the source for this Cash Journal Line.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Multiplier Quantity
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Value to multiply quantities by for generating commissions.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Multiplier Quantity field indicates the amount to multiply the quantities accumulated for this commission run.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Subtract Quantity
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Quantity to subtract when generating commissions
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Quantity Subtract identifies the quantity to be subtracted before multiplication

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Payment Processor Class
AD_ELEMENT.HELP:
Payment Processor class identifies the Java class used to process payments extending the org.compiere.model.PaymentProcessor class.
Example implementations are Optimal Payments: org.compiere.model.PP_Optimal or Verisign: org.compiere.model.PP_PayFlowPro

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Knowledge Category
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Set up knowledge categories and values as a search aid. Examples are Release Version, Product Area, etc. Knowledge Category values act like keyworks.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Current balance
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Current Balance field indicates the current balance in this account.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Web Parameter 2
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The parameter could be used in the JSP page for variables like logos, passwords, URLs or entire HTML blocks. The access is via ctx.webParam2 - By default, it is positioned after the header on the web store index page.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Credit Card
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Credit Card drop down list box is used for selecting the type of Credit Card presented for payment.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Region
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Region Name defines the name that will print when this region is used in a document.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Replication Log
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Data Replication Run Log

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Replication Run
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Data Replication Run information

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Replication Strategy
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Data Replication Strategy determines what and how tables are replicated

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Replication Table
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Determines how the table is replicated

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Replicated
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The data replication was successful.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Request User Password
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Password of the user name (ID) for mail processing

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Line Alignment
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: For relative positioning, the line alignment

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Area
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Print area of this item

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Format
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Format is a drop down list box for selecting the format type (text, tab delimited, XML, etc) of the file to be imported

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Statement amount
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Statement Amount indicates the amount of a single statement line.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Check Print Format
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: You need to define a Print Format to print the document.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Bottom Margin
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Space on bottom of a page in 1/72 inch

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Left Margin
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Space on left side of a page in 1/72 inch

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Right Margin
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Space on right side of a page in 1/72 inch

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Top Margin
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Space on top of a page in 1/72 inch

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Product Column
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Product Column indicates the product to use to use when calculating this measurement.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Sql SELECT
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Select Clause indicates the SQL SELECT clause to use for selecting the record for a measure calculation. Do not include the SELECT itself.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Single Assignment only
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Only one assignment at a time (no double-booking or overlapping)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If selected, you can only have one assignment for the resource at a single point in time. It is also not possible to have overlapping assignments.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Social Security No
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Social Security number being used as identification.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Account Name
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Name on Credit Card or Account holder
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Name of the Credit Card or Account holder.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Achievement
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Achievement identifies a unique task that is part of an overall performance goal.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Credit Status
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Credit Management is inactive if Credit Status is No Credit Check, Credit Stop or if the Credit Limit is 0. If active, the status is set automatically set to Credit Hold, if the Total Open Balance (including Vendor activities) is higher then the Credit Limit. It is set to Credit Watch, if above 90% of the Credit Limit and Credit OK otherwise.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Reference (DC)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Payment Reference indicates the reference returned from the Credit Card Company for a payment

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Disposed
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The asset is no longer used and disposed

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: In Possession
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The asset is in the possession of the organization
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Assets which are not in possession are e.g. at Customer site and may or may not be owned by the company.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Owned
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The asset is owned by the organization
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The asset may not be in possession, but the asset is legally owned by the organization

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Life use
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Units of use until the asset is not usable anymore
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Life use and the actual use may be used to calculate the depreciation

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: SMTP Authentication
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Some email servers require authentication before sending emails. If yes, users are required to define their email user name and password. If authentication is required and no user name and password is required, delivery will fail.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Product Type
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The type of product also determines accounting consequences.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: System
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Common System Definition

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Partner ID
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Partner ID or Account for the Payment Processor
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Partner ID (Verisign) or Account ID (Optimal)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Pay-From Address
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Business Partner pays from that address and we'll send dunning letters there
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If the Pay-From Address is selected, this location is the address the Business Partner pays from and where dunning letters will be sent to.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Discount Schema
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Schema to calculate the trade discount percentage
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: After calculation of the (standard) price, the trade discount percentage is calculated and applied resulting in the final price.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Same Line
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Displayed on same line as previous field
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Same Line checkbox indicates that the field will display on the same line as the previous field.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Display Logic
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: If the Field is displayed, the result determines if the field is actually displayed
AD_ELEMENT.HELP:
format := {expression} [{logic} {expression}]
expression := @{context}@{operand}{value} or @{context}@{operand}{value}
logic := {|}|{&}
context := any global or window context
value := strings or numbers
logic operators := AND or OR with the previous result from left to right
operand := eq{=}, gt{>}, le{<}, not{~^!}
Examples:
@AD_Table_ID@=14 | @Language@!GERGER
@PriceLimit@>10 | @PriceList@>@PriceActual@
@Name@>J
Strings may be in single quotes (optional)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Tax
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Tax indicates the type of tax used in document line.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Phys.Inventory
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Physical Inventory indicates a unique parameters for a physical inventory.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Phys.Inventory Line
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Unique line in an Inventory document
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Physical Inventory Line indicates the inventory document line (if applicable) for this transaction

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Last Result
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Last Result identifies the result of the last contact made.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Replenish Type
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Replenish Type indicates if this product will be manually re-ordered, ordered when the quantity is below the minimum quantity or ordered when it is below the maximum quantity. If you select a custom replenishment type, you need to create a class implementing org.compiere.util.ReplenishInterface and set that on warehouse level.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Threshold min
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Minimum gross amount for withholding calculation
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Threshold Minimum indicates the minimum gross amount to be used in the withholding calculation.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Title
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Name this entity is referred to as
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Title indicates the name that an entity is referred to as.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Commission Run
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Commission Run is a unique system defined identifier of a specific run of commission. When a Commission is processed on the Commission Screen, the Commission Run will display.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Print Format
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The print format determines how data is rendered for print.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Included Print Format
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Print format that is included here.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Included Print formats allow to e.g. Lines to Header records. The Column provides the parent link.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Calculate Mean (?)
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Calculate Average of numeric content or length
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Calculate the Mean (?) of the data if the field is numeric, otherwise calculate the average length of the field.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Calculate Count (?)
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Count number of not empty elements
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Calculate the total number (?) of not empty (NULL) elements (maximum is the number of lines).

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Check No
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Check Number indicates the number on the check.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Tax Amount
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Tax Amount displays the total tax amount for a document.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Freight Cost Rule
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Freight Cost Rule indicates the method used when charging for freight.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Location From
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Location that inventory was moved from
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Location From indicates the location that a product was moved from.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Dunning
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Dunning indicates the rules and method of dunning for past due payments.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Std PO Cost Amount Sum
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Standard Cost Purchase Order Amount Sum (internal)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Current cumulative amount for calculating the standard cost difference based on (planned) purchase order price

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Std PO Cost Quantity Sum
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Standard Cost Purchase Order Quantity Sum (internal)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Current cumulative quantity for calculating the standard cost difference based on (planned) purchase order price

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Line ID
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Internal link

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: PPV Offset
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Offset account for standard costing purchase price variances. The counter account is Product PPV.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Last Invoice Price
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Price of the last invoice for the product
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Last Invoice Price indicates the last price paid (per the invoice) for this product.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Total Invoice Amount
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The cumulative total lifetime invoice amount is used to calculate the total average price

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Total Invoice Quantity
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The cumulative total lifetime invoice quantity is used to calculate the total average price

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Price includes Tax
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Tax is included in the price
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Tax Included checkbox indicates if the prices include tax. This is also known as the gross price.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Requires Tax Certificate
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: This tax rate requires the Business Partner to be tax exempt
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Requires Tax Certificate indicates that a tax certificate is required for a Business Partner to be tax exempt.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Replication Type
AD_ELEMENT.HELP:
The Type of data Replication determines the directon of the data replication.
Reference means that the data in this system is read only ->
Local means that the data in this system is not replicated to other systems -
Merge means that the data in this system is synchronized with the other system <->

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: ID Range End
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: End if the ID Range used
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The ID Range allows to restrict the range of the internally used IDs. Please note that the ID range is NOT enforced.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: ID Range Start
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Start of the ID Range used
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The ID Range allows to restrict the range of the internally used IDs. The standard rages are 0-899,999 for the Application Dictionary 900,000-999,999 for Application Dictionary customizations/extensions and > 1,000,000 for client data. The standard system limit is 9,999,999,999 but can easily be extended. The ID range is on a per table basis. Please note that the ID range is NOT enforced.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Remote Client
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Remote Client to be used to replicate / synchronize data with.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The remote client used for data replication.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Transaction Type
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Transaction Type indicates the type of transaction to be submitted to the Credit Card Company.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Transaction Date
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Transaction Date indicates the date of the transaction.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Verification Code
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Credit Card Verification code on credit card
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Credit Card Verification indicates the verification code on the credit card (AMEX 4 digits on front; MC,Visa 3 digits back)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: User Substitute
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: A user who can act for another user.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Not-invoiced Revenue
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Not Invoiced Revenue account indicates the account used for recording revenue that has not yet been invoiced.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Parent Organization
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Parent Organization - the next level in the organizational hierarchy.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Current Next (System)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: This field is for system use only and should not be modified.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Date last inventory count
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Date Last Inventory Count indicates the last time an Inventory count was done.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Sales Region Tree
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Tree to determine sales regional hierarchy
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Trees are used for (finanial) reporting

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: User/Contact
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: User within the system - Internal or Business Partner Contact
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The User identifies a unique user in the system. This could be an internal user or a business partner contact

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: URL
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The URL defines an fully qualified web address like http://www.adempiere.org

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Account State
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: State of the Credit Card or Account holder
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The State of the Credit Card or Account holder

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Trade Discount Granted
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Trade Discount Granted Account indicates the account for granted trade discount in sales invoices

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Positive only
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Positive Only check box indicates that if the result of the subtraction is negative, it is ignored. This would mean that negative commissions would not be generated.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Sql WHERE
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Where Clause indicates the SQL WHERE clause to use for record selection. The WHERE clause is added to the query. Fully qualified means "tablename.columnname".

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Purchase Price Variance
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Difference between Standard Cost and Purchase Price (PPV)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Purchase Price Variance is used in Standard Costing. It reflects the difference between the Standard Cost and the Purchase Order Price.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Payment Discount Expense
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Indicates the account to be charged for payment discount expenses.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Ship/Receipt Confirmation Line
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Material Shipment or Receipt Confirmation Line
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Confirmation details

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Sales Tax
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: This is a sales tax (i.e. not a value added tax)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If selected AP tax is handled as expense, otherwise it is handeled as a VAT credit.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Partner Bank Account
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Bank Account of the Business Partner
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Partner Bank Account identifies the bank account to be used for this Business Partner

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Special Form
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Special Form field identifies a unique Special Form in the system.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Fully Qualified
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Fully Qualified check box indicates that all required elements for an account combination are present.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Generated
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Generated checkbox identifies a journal line that was generated from a source document. Lines could also be entered manually or imported.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Heading only
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Field without Column - Only label is displayed
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Heading Only checkbox indicates if just the label will display on the screen

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Cash Transfer
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Account for Invoices paid by cash

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Commodity Code
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Commodity code used for tax calculation
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Commodity Code indicates a code that is used in tax calculations

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Correct tax for Discounts/Charges
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Correct the tax for payment discount and charges
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Payment discounts may require to correct the tax. This primarily applicable in VAT systems. If the original invoice had tax records, the payment discount, write-off, etc. is corrected by the tax. The calculation of the tax is prorated based on the invoice.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: PO Payment Term
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Payment rules for a purchase order
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The PO Payment Term indicates the payment term that will be used when this purchase order becomes an invoice.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Planned Margin
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Planned Margin Amount indicates the anticipated margin amount for this project or project line.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Bank Settlement Loss
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Bank Settlement loss account identifies the account to be used when recording a currency loss when the settlement and receipt currency are not the same.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Commission Line
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Commission Line is a unique instance of a Commission Run. If the commission run was done in summary mode then there will be a single line representing the selected documents totals. If the commission run was done in detail mode then each document that was included in the run will have its own commission line.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Birthday
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Birthday or Anniversary day

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Opt-out Date
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If the field has a date, the customer opted out (unsubscribed) and cannot receive mails for the Interest Area

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: EMail User ID
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: User Name (ID) in the Mail System
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The user name in the mail system is usually the string before the @ of your email address. Required if the mail server requires authentification to send emails.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: EMail User Password
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Password of your email user id
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Required if the mail server requires authentification to send emails.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Amount
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Amount indicates the amount for this document line.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Header Row BG Color
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Table header row background color

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Header Row Color
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Foreground color if the table header row
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Table header row foreground color

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Print Function Symbols
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Print Symbols for Functions (Sum, Average, Count)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If selected, print symbols - otherwise print names of the function

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Set Standard Cost to
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Set new Standard Costs to the selection

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Error EMail
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Email address to send error messages to

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Pick/QA Confirmation
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Require Pick or QA Confirmation before processing
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The processing of the Shipment (Receipt) requires Pick (QA) Confirmation. Note that shipments for automatic documents like POS/Warehouse Orders cannot have confirmations!

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Partner Location
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Identifies the (ship to) address for this Business Partner
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Partner address indicates the location of a Business Partner
AD_ELEMENT.PO_DESCRIPTION: Identifies the (ship from) address for this Business Partner
AD_ELEMENT.PO_HELP: The Partner address indicates the location of a Business Partner

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Mail Text
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Mail Text indicates the text used for mail messages.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Message
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Information and Error messages

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Allow UoM Fractions
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If allowed, you can enter UoM Fractions

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Assign From
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Assignment start

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: SLA Goal
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Goal for the SLA criteria for the Business Partner

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: SLA Measure
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: View/Maintain the individual actual value / measure for the business partner service level agreement goal

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: List Prive
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Price List converted to entered UOM

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Overwrite Product
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Overwrite the account segment Product with the value specified
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If not overwritten, the value of the original account combination is used. If selected, but not specified, the segment is set to null.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Employee Prepayment
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Employee Prepayment Account identifies the account to use for recording expense advances made to this employee.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Sales Volume in 1.000
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Total Volume of Sales in Thousands of Currency
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Sales Volume indicates the total volume of sales for a Business Partner.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Line No
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Indicates the unique line for a document. It will also control the display order of the lines within a document.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Line Amount
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Line Extended Amount (Quantity * Actual Price) without Freight and Charges
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Indicates the extended line amount based on the quantity and the actual price. Any additional charges or freight are not included. The Amount may or may not include tax. If the price list is inclusive tax, the line amount is the same as the line total.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Rating
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Rating is used to differentiate the importance

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Routing No
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Bank Routing Number (ABA Number) identifies a legal Bank. It is used in routing checks and electronic transactions.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Order Column
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Integer Column of the table determining the order (display, sort, ..). If defined, the Order By replaces the default Order By clause. It should be fully qualified (i.e. "tablename.columnname").

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Counter Document
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: When using explicit documents for inter-org transaction (after linking a Business Partner to an Organization), you can determine what document type the counter document is based on the document type of the original transaction. Example: a "Standard Order" creates a "Standard PO". If you define a relationship here, you overwrite the default counter document type in the Document Type definition. This allows you to define a specific mapping.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Service date
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Service Date indicates the date that the service was provided.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Quantity Invoiced
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Quantity of product or service invoiced
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Quantity Invoiced indicates the total quantity of a product or service that has been invoiced.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Current vendor
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Use this Vendor for pricing and stock replenishment
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Current Vendor indicates if prices are used and Product is reordered from this vendor

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Assign To
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Assignment end

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Best Response Amount
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Filled by Rank Response Process

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Below Column
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Print this column below the column index entered
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: This column is printed in a second line below the content of the first line identified. Please be aware, that this is depends on the actual sequence. Enter a 1 to add the info below the first column.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Data Column 2
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Additional Graph Data Column for Line/Bar Charts

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Data Column 3
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Additional Graph Data Column for Line/Bar Charts

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Employees
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Indicates the number of employees for this Business Partner. This field displays only for Prospects.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Direct print
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Direct Print checkbox indicates that this report will print without a print dialog box being displayed.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Paid to third party
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Amount paid to someone other than the Business Partner
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Paid to Third Party checkbox indicates that the amounts are paid to someone other than the Business Partner.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Volume
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Volume indicates the volume of the product in the Volume UOM of the Client

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Discount Schema Break
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Trade discount based on breaks (steps)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Discount Pricelist
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Line of the pricelist trade discount schema
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: For the Pricelist Discount Type, you enter how the list, standard and limit price is calculated.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Fax
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Fax identifies a facsimile number for this Business Partner or Location

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: End Date
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The End Date indicates the last date in this range.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Group by
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: After a group change, totals, etc. are printed
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Grouping allows to print sub-totals. If a group changes, the totals are printed. Group by columns need to be included in the sort order.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Fixed Width
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Column has a fixed width, independent from the content

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Date To
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: End date of a date range
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Date To indicates the end date of a range (inclusive)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Performance Goal
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Goal Performance indicates the target achievement from 0 to 1.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Std Cost Quantity Sum
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Current cumulative quantity for calculating the standard cost difference based on (actual) invoice price

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Elapsed Time ms
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Elapsed Time in mili seconds

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Start Point
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Start point of the gradient colors
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The gradient starts at the start point (e.g. North). The repeat distance determines if and how often the gradient colors are repeated. If starting from southern points, the upper color is actually at the button.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Revenue Recognition Plan
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Plan for recognizing or recording revenue
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Revenue Recognition Plan identifies a unique Revenue Recognition Plan.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Revenue Recognition Run
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Revenue Recognition Runs identifies a unique instance of processing revenue recognition.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Slot End
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Ending time for time slots

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Slot Start
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Starting time for time slots

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Bank Expense
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Bank Expense Account identifies the account to be used for recording charges or fees incurred from this Bank.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Bank Interest Expense
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Bank Interest Expense Account identifies the account to be used for recording interest expenses.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Selection Column
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Is this column used for finding rows in windows
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If selected, the column is listed in the first find window tab and in the selection part of the window

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: End Wait
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: End of suspension (sleep)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Project Cycle
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Identifier for this Project Reporting Cycle
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Identifies a Project Cycle which can be made up of one or more cycle steps and cycle phases.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: BinaryData
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Binary field stores binary data.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Request Amount
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Request Amount indicates any amount that is associated with this request. For example, a warranty amount or refund amount.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Postal Code Format
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Format of the postal code; Can contain fixed format elements, Variables: "_lLoOaAcCa09"
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Validation elements: (Space) any character _ Space (fixed character) l any Letter a..Z NO space L any Letter a..Z NO space converted to upper case o any Letter a..Z or space O any Letter a..Z or space converted to upper case a any Letters & Digits NO space A any Letters & Digits NO space converted to upper case c any Letters & Digits or space C any Letters & Digits or space converted to upper case 0 Digits 0..9 NO space 9 Digits 0..9 or space Example of format "(000)_000-0000"

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Delayed Capture
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Delayed Capture is required, if you ship products. The first credit card transaction is the Authorization, the second is the actual transaction after the shipment of the product.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Tracking URL
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: URL of the shipper to track shipments
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The variable @TrackingNo@ in the URL is replaced by the actual tracking number of the shipment.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: POS Terminal
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The POS Terminal defines the defaults and functions available for the POS Form

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Knowledge Source
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Source of a Knowlegde Entry is a pointer to the originating system. The Knowledge Entry has an additional entry (Description URL) for more detailed info.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Knowledge Synonym
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Search Synonyms for Knowledge Keywords; Example: Product = Item

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Knowledge Topic
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Topic or Discussion Thead

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Knowldge Type
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Area of knowlege - A Type has multiple Topics

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Keywords
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: List of Keywords - separated by space, comma or semicolon
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: List if individual keywords for search relevancy. The keywords are separated by space, comma or semicolon.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Synonym Name
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The synonym broadens the search

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Public Write
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If selected, public users can write/create entries. Public are users without a Role in the system. Use security rules for more specic access control.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: RfQ Topic Subscriber Restriction
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Include Subscriber only for certain products or product categories
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Products and/or Product Categories for which the subscriber should be included. If no product / category is entered, the subscriber is requested to answer requests for all lines in a RfQ

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Default Account
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Name of the Default Account Column

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: ZIP
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Postal Code or ZIP identifies the postal code for this entity's address.
The Additional ZIP or Postal Code identifies, if appropriate, any additional Postal Code information.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: PostingType
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The type of posted amount for the transaction
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Posting Type indicates the type of amount (Actual, Budget, Reservation, Commitment, Statistical) the transaction.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Created By
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Created By field indicates the user who created this record.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Displayed
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Determines, if this field is displayed
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If the field is displayed, the field Display Logic will determine at runtime, if it is actually displayed

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Message Text
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Textual Informational, Menu or Error Message
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Message Text indicates the message that will display

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: PO Price
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Price based on a purchase order
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The PO Price indicates the price for a product per the purchase order.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Date From
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Date From indicates the starting date of a range.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Summary
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Summary allows free form text entry of a recap of this request.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Response Message
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Response Message indicates the message returned from the Credit Card Company as the result of a transmission

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Mandatory
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Data entry is required in this column
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The field must have a value for the record to be saved to the database.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Invoice Week Day
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Invoice Week Day indicates the day of the week to generate invoices.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Discount Type
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Type of procedure used to calculate the trade discount percentage

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Date
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Date when business is not conducted
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Date field identifies a calendar date on which business will not be conducted.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Measure Calculation
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Measure Calculation indicates the method of measuring performance.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Production
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Production uniquely identifies a Production Plan

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Demand Line
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Demand for a product in a period

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Forecast
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Material Forecast

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Asset
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Asset used internally or by customers
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: An asset is either created by purchasing or by delivering a product. An asset can be used internally or be a customer asset.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Account EMail
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The EMail Address indicates the EMail address off the Credit Card or Account holder.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Driver License
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Driver's License being used as identification.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Escalate after Days Due
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Escalation to superior after number of due days (0 = no)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The item will be escalated and assigned to the supervisor after the number of days over due. If 0, there is no escalation.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Result
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Response Result indicates the result of the transmission to the Credit Card Company.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Cash Journal Line
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Cash Journal Line indicates a unique line in a cash journal.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Accept ATM
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Indicates if Bank ATM Cards are accepted

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Invoice Price Variance
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Difference between Costs and Invoice Price (IPV)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Invoice Price Variance is used reflects the difference between the current Costs and the Invoice Price.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Planned Price
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Planned price for this project line
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Planned Price indicates the anticipated price for this project line.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Demand
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Material Demand can be based on Forecast, Requisitions, Open Orders

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Demand Detail
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Source Link for Material Demand Lines

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Threshold max
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Maximum gross amount for withholding calculation (0=no limit)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Threshold maximum indicates the maximum gross amount to be used in the withholding calculation . A value of 0 indicates there is no limit.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Account Element
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Account Elements can be natural accounts or user defined values.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Invoiced Amount
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The amount invoiced

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Maintain Change Log
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If selected, a log of all changes is maintained.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: One Line Only
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: If selected, only one line is printed
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If the column has a width restriction, the text is broken into multiple lines. If One Line is selected, only the first line is printed.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Customer
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Indicates if this Business Partner is a Customer
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Customer checkbox indicates if this Business Partner is a customer. If it is select additional fields will display which further define this customer.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Records deleteable
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Indicates if records can be deleted from the database
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Records Deleteable checkbox indicates if a record can be deleted from the database. If records cannot be deleted, you can only deselect the Active flag

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Partner Product Key
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Product Key of the Business Partner
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Business Partner Product Key identifies the number used by the Business Partner for this product. It can be printed on orders and invoices when you include the Product Key in the print format.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Activity
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Activities indicate tasks that are performed and used to utilize Activity based Costing

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Backordered
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Calculated: ordered - delivered quantity

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Warehouse Address
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Address of Warehouse

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Related Entry
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Related Knowlege Entry for this Knowledge Entry

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Tunnel via HTTP
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Connect to Server via HTTP Tunnel
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If selected, the connection to the server is via a HTTP tunnel, otherwise it uses an RMI/JNP connection

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Authorization Code (DC)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Authorization Code indicates the code returned from the electronic transmission.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Mandatory Guarantee Date
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The entry of a Guarantee Date is mandatory when creating a Product Instance

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Mandatory Lot
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The entry of Lot info is mandatory when creating a Product Instance

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: To
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The To Country indicates the receiving country on a document

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Header Margin
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Margin of the Header in 1/72 of an inch
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Distance from the top of the printable page to the start of the main content in 1/72 of an inch (point)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Ship/Receipt Confirmation
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Require Ship or Receipt Confirmation before processing
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The processing of the Shipment (Receipt) requires Ship (Receipt) Confirmation. Note that shipments for automatic documents like POS/Warehouse Orders cannot have confirmations!

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Form
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: If Selected, a Form is printed, if not selected a columnar List report
AD_ELEMENT.HELP:
A form has individual elements with layout information (example: invoice, check)
A columnar list report has individual columns (example: list of invoices)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Planned Amount
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Planned Amount indicates the anticipated amount for this project or project line.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Cash Book Asset
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Cash Book Asset Account identifies the account to be used for recording payments into and disbursements from this cash book.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Cash Book Differences
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Cash Book Differences Account identifies the account to be used for recording any differences that affect this cash book

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Report Column Set
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Report Column Set identifies the columns used in a Report.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Paint Boundary Lines
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Paint lines around table

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Paint Horizontal Lines
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Paint horizontal table lines

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Paint Vertical Lines
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Paint vertical table lines

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Weight
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Weight indicates the weight of the product in the Weight UOM of the Client

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Post Statistical
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Post statistical quantities to this account?

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Remittance Mail Text
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Email text used for sending payment remittances
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Standard email template used to send remittances as attachments.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Guarantee Days
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Number of days the product is guaranteed or available
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If the value is 0, there is no limit to the availability or guarantee, otherwise the guarantee date is calculated by adding the days to the delivery date.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Tax Credit
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Account for Tax you can reclaim
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Tax Credit Account indicates the account used to record taxes that can be reclaimed

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Voice authorization code
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Voice Authorization Code from credit card company
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Voice Authorization Code indicates the code received from the Credit Card Company.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: W_Basket_ID
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Temporary Web Basket

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Bank Revaluation Loss
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Bank Revaluation Loss Account identifies the account to be used for recording losses that are recognized when converting currencies.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Bank Settlement Gain
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Bank Settlement Gain account identifies the account to be used when recording a currency gain when the settlement and receipt currency are not the same.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Page break
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Before printing this item, create a new page

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Document BaseType
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Document Base Type identifies the base or starting point for a document. Multiple document types may share a single document base type.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Date next action
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Date that this request should be acted on
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Date Next Action indicates the next scheduled date for an action to occur for this request.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Require CreditCard Verification Code
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Require CC Verification checkbox indicates if this bank accounts requires a verification number for credit card transactions.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Tax Due
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Account for Tax you have to pay
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Tax Due Account indicates the account used to record taxes that you are liable to pay.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Future Days
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Number of days to be able to post to a future date (based on system date)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If Automatic Period Control is enabled, the current period is calculated based on the system date and you can always post to all days in the current period. Future Days enable to post to future periods. E.g. today is Apr 15th and Future Days is set to 30, you can post up to May 15th

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Language
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Language identifies the language to use for display and formatting

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Customer Prepayment
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Customer Prepayment account indicates the account to be used for recording prepayments from a customer.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Customer Receivables
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Customer Receivables Accounts indicates the account to be used for recording transaction for customers receivables.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Multiply Rate
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Rate to multiple the source by to calculate the target.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: To convert Source number to Target number, the Source is multiplied by the multiply rate. If the Multiply Rate is entered, then the Divide Rate will be automatically calculated.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Tax Expense
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Account for paid tax you cannot reclaim
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Tax Expense Account indicates the account used to record the taxes that have been paid that cannot be reclaimed.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Statistic Count
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Internal statistics how often the entity was used
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: For internal use.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Journal Line
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The General Ledger Journal Line identifies a single transaction in a journal.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Address verified
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Address Verified indicates if the address has been verified by the Credit Card Company.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Invoice Price
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Unit price to be invoiced or 0 for default price
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Unit Price in the currency of the business partner! If it is 0, the standard price of the sales price list of the business partner (customer) is used.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Standard Cost PO Difference
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Accumulated difference of Purchase Order Costs to Standard Costs

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Data Column 4
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Additional Graph Data Column for Line/Bar Charts

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Data Column 5
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Additional Graph Data Column for Line/Bar Charts

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Data Column
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Data Column for Pie and Line Charts
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Graph Data Column for Pie and Line/Bar Charts

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Limit Price
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Price Limit indicates the lowest price for a product stated in the Price List Currency.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Maximum write-off per Invoice
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Maximum invoice amount to be written off in invoice currency

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: User ID
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The User ID identifies a user and allows access to records or processes.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Business Partner Key
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The Key of the Business Partner

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Project Mail Text
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Standard text for Project EMails

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Maximum Runs
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Number of recurring documents to be generated in total

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Remaining Runs
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Number of recurring documents to be still generated

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Swift code
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Swift Code (Society of Worldwide Interbank Financial Telecommunications) or BIC (Bank Identifier Code) is an identifier of a Bank. The first 4 characters are the bank code, followed by the 2 character country code, the two character location code and optional 3 character branch code. For details see http://www.swift.com/biconline/index.cfm

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Manufacturer
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The manufacturer of the Product (used if different from the Business Partner / Vendor)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Report Line Set Name
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Name of the Report Line Set

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Credit Limit
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Credit Limit indicates the total amount allowed 'on account' in primary accounting currency. If the Credit Limit is 0, no ckeck is performed. Credit Management is based on the Total Open Amount, which includes Vendor activities.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Attribute Value Type
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Attribute Value type deternines the data/validation type

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: RfQ Quantity
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The quantity is used when generating RfQ Responses
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: When generating the RfQ Responses, this quantity is included

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: SLA Criteria
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Criteria to measure service level agreements (e.g. Quality, Delivery meets Promised date, ..)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Subtract Amount
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Subtract Amount indicates the amount to subtract from the total amount prior to multiplication.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Commission
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Commission Rules or internal or external company agents, sales reps or vendors.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Classname
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Classname identifies the Java classname used by this report or process.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Label Height
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Physical height of the label

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Printer Name
AD_ELEMENT.HELP:
Internal (Opereating System) Name of the Printer; Please mote that the printer name may be different on different clients. Enter a printer name, which applies to ALL clients (e.g. printer on a server).

If none is entered, the default printer is used. You specify your default printer when you log in. You can also change the default printer in Preferences.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Cycle Step Name
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Name of the Prohect Cycle Step

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: SO/PO Type
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Sales Tax applies to sales situations, Purchase Tax to purchase situations
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Sales Tax: charged when selling - examples: Sales Tax, Output VAT (payable) Purchase Tax: tax charged when purchasing - examples: Use Tax, Input VAT (receivable)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Only Validate Data
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Validate the date and do not process

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Import only if No Errors
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Only start the import, if there are no validation Errors

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Key column
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: This column is the key in this table
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The key column must also be display sequence 0 in the field definition and may be hidden.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Reference Key
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Required to specify, if data type is Table or List
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Reference Value indicates where the reference values are stored. It must be specified if the data type is Table or List.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: List Details
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The List Details checkbox indicates that the details for each document line will be displayed.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Commission Detail
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Commission Detail provides supporting information on a Commission Run. Each document line that was part of the Commission Run will be reflected here.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Payment Batch
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Electronic Fund Transfer Payment Batch.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Phone Format
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Format of the phone; Can contain fixed format elements, Variables: "_lLoOaAcCa09"
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Validation elements: (Space) any character _ Space (fixed character) l any Letter a..Z NO space L any Letter a..Z NO space converted to upper case o any Letter a..Z or space O any Letter a..Z or space converted to upper case a any Letters & Digits NO space A any Letters & Digits NO space converted to upper case c any Letters & Digits or space C any Letters & Digits or space converted to upper case 0 Digits 0..9 NO space 9 Digits 0..9 or space Example of format "(000)_000-0000"

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Featured in Web Store
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: If selected, the product is displayed in the inital or any empy search
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: In the display of products in the Web Store, the product is displayed in the inital view or if no search criteria are entered. To be displayed, the product must be in the price list used.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Good for Days
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Shelf Life Days remaning to Guarantee Date (minus minimum guarantee days)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Shelf Life of products with Guarantee Date instance compared to today minus the minimum guaranteed days. (Guarantee Date-Today) Min Guarantee Days

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Available Quantity
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Quantity available to promise = On Hand minus Reserved Quantity

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Remaining Shelf Life %
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Remaining shelf life in percent based on Guarantee Date
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: (Guarantee Date-Today) / Guarantee Days

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Allocation Strategy
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Allocation from incoming to outgoing transactions

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Calculate Deviation (?)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Standard Deviation (?) is the a measure of dispersion - used in combination with the Mean (?)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Calculate Variance (?)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Variance (?) is the a measure of dispersion - used in combination with the Mean (?)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Attribute Set
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Define Product Attribute Sets to add additional attributes and values to the product. You need to define a Attribute Set if you want to enable Serial and Lot Number tracking.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Asset Disposal Date
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Date when the asset is/was disposed

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Market value Amount
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: For reporting, the market value of the asset

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: In Service Date
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Date when Asset was put into service
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The date when the asset was put into service - usually used as start date for depreciation.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Invoice Line
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Invoice Line uniquely identifies a single line of an Invoice.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Revenue Recognition
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Revenue Recognition indicates how revenue will be recognized for this product

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Bin (Y)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Y dimension indicates the Bin a product is located in

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: SKU
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The SKU indicates a user defined stock keeping unit. It may be used for an additional bar code symbols or your own schema.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Sales Price list
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: This is a Sales Price List
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Sales Price List check box indicates if this price list is used for sales transactions.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Fully depreciated
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The asset costs are fully amortized.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Message ID
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: SMTP Message ID for tracking purposes

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Referenced Order Line
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Reference of the Sales Order Line to the corresponding Purchase Order Line or vice versa.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Asset Delivery
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The availability of the asset to the business partner (customer).

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Asset Group
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The group of assets determines default accounts. If an asset group is selected in the product category, assets are created when delivering the asset.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Asset Retirement
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Internally used asset is not longer used.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Asset Depreciation Date
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Date of the last deprecation, if the asset is used internally and depreciated.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Standard price min Margin
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Minimum margin allowed for a product
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Standard Price Min Margin indicates the minimum margin for a product. The margin is calculated by subtracting the original Standard price from the newly calculated price. If this field contains 0.00 then it is ignored.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Unearned Revenue
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Unearned Revenue indicates the account used for recording invoices sent for products or services not yet delivered. It is used in revenue recognition

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Vendor Service Liability
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Vendor Service Liability account indicates the account to use for recording service liabilities. It is used if you need to distinguish between Liability for products and services. This account is only used, if posting to service accounts is enabled in the accounting schema.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Vendor Prepayment
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Vendor Prepayment Account indicates the account used to record prepayments from a vendor.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Max. Value
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Maximum Value indicates the highest allowable value for a field

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Currency To
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Currency To defines the target currency for this conversion rate.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Bill of Materials
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Bill of Materials check box indicates if this product consists of a bill of materials.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: BOM Product
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The BOM Product identifies an element that is part of this Bill of Materials.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Mandatory Serial No
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The entry of a Serial No is mandatory when creating a Product Instance

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Min Shelf Life Days
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Minimum Shelf Life in days based on Product Instance Guarantee Date
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Miminum Shelf Life of products with Guarantee Date instance. If > 0 you cannot select products with a shelf life less than the minum shelf life, unless you select "Show All"

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Shelf Life Days
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Shelf Life in days based on Product Instance Guarantee Date
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Shelf Life of products with Guarantee Date instance compared to today.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Partner Tax ID
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Tax ID of the Business Partner

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Description Only
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: if true, the line is just description and no transaction
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If a line is Description Only, e.g. Product Inventory is not corrected. No accounting transactions are created and the amount or totals are not included in the document. This for including descriptional detail lines, e.g. for an Work Order.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Repeat Distance
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Distance in points to repeat gradient color - or zero
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The gradient color is not repeated, if the value is zero. The distance is added to (or subtracted from) the starting point of the gradient.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Image
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Images and Icon can be used to display supported graphic formats (gif, jpg, png). You can either load the image (in the database) or point to a graphic via a URI (i.e. it can point to a resource, http address)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Next Page
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The column is printed on the next page
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Before printing this column, there will be a page break.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Set Future Costs to
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Set the Future costs to the selection

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Header Line Color
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Color of the table header row lines

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Accumulation Type
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: How to accumulate data on time axis
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Sum adds the data points (e.g. stock volume) - Average is appropriate for e.g. Stock Price

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Product Expense
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Product Expense Account indicates the account used to record expenses associated with this product.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Default Counter Document
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The document type is the default counter document type
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: When using explicit documents for inter-org transaction (after linking a Business Partner to an Organization), you can determine what document type the counter document is based on the document type of the original transaction. Example: when generating a Sales Order, use this Sales Order document type. This default can be overwritten by defining explicit counter document relationships.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Document Type for ProForma
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Document type used for pro forma invoices generated from this sales document
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: he Document Type for Invoice indicates the document type that will be used when an invoice is generated from this sales document. This field will display only when the base document type is Sales Order and the Pro Forma Invoice checkbox is selected

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Discontinued by
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Discontinued By indicates the individual who discontinued this product

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Discount %
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Discount indicates the discount applied or taken as a percentage.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Usable Life - Months
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Months of the usable life of the asset

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Usable Life - Years
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Years of the usable life of the asset

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Use units
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Currently used units of the assets

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: EMail PDF
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Email Document PDF files to Business Partner

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Beginning Balance
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Beginning Balance is the balance prior to making any adjustments for payments or disbursements.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Bank Statement
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Bank Statement identifies a unique Bank Statement for a defined time period. The statement defines all transactions that occurred

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Interest Area
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Interest Areas reflect interest in a topic by a contact. Interest areas can be used for marketing campaigns.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Request Type
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Request Types are used for processing and categorizing requests. Options are Account Inquiry, Warranty Issue, etc.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Subscribe Date
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Date the contact subscribe the interest area

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Commit Warning
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Warning or information displayed when committing the record

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Accept Visa
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Indicates if Visa Cards are accepted

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Counter Document Type
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Document Type of the generated counter document

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Target Document Type
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Target document type for conversing documents
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: You can convert document types (e.g. from Offer to Order or Invoice). The conversion is then reflected in the current type. This processing is initiated by selecting the appropriate Document Action.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Min Amount
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Minimum amount indicates the minimum amount as stated in the currency of the invoice.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Ship/Receipt Confirmation Import Line
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Material Shipment or Receipt Confirmation Import Line
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Import Confirmation Line Details

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Responses Accepted
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Are Resonses to the Request for Quotation accepted
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If selected, responses for the RfQ are accepted

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Days to keep Log
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Number of days to keep the log entries
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Older Log entries may be deleted

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Guarantee Date
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Date when the normal guarantee or availability expires

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Exclude
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Exclude access to the data - if not selected Include access to the data
AD_ELEMENT.HELP:
If selected (excluded), the role cannot access the data specified. If not selected (included), the role can ONLY access the data specified. Exclude items represent a negative list (i.e. you don't have access to the listed items). Include items represent a positive list (i.e. you only have access to the listed items).
You would usually not mix Exclude and Include. If you have one include rule in your list, you would only have access to that item anyway.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Bank statement line
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Line on a statement from this Bank
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Bank Statement Line identifies a unique transaction (Payment, Withdrawal, Charge) for the defined time period at this Bank.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Business Partner Group
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Business Partner Group provides a method of defining defaults to be used for individual Business Partners.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Payment
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Payment is a unique identifier of this payment.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Expense Amount
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Expense amount in currency

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Web Parameter 1
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The parameter could be used in the JSP page for variables like logos, passwords, URLs or entire HTML blocks. The access is via ctx.webParam1 - By default, it is positioned on the upper left side with 130 pixel width.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Attach Asset
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Attach Asset to be delivered per email

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Web Store Info
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Display HTML Info in the Web Store - by default in the header.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Web Parameter 5
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The parameter could be used in the JSP page for variables like logos, passwords, URLs or entire HTML blocks. The access is via ctx.webParam5 - By default, it is positioned in the center of the footer.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Project Issue
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Issues to the project initiated by the "Issue to Project" process. You can issue Receipts, Time and Expenses, or Stock.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Order Mail Text
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Email text used for sending order acknowledgements or quotations
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Standard email template used to send acknowledgements or quotations as attachments.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Industry Info
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Information of the industry (e.g. professional service, distribution of furnitures, ..)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Description if the industry ad precise as possible.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Color Schema
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Visual representation of performance by color. The Schema has often three levels (e.g. red-yellow-green). Adempiere support two levels (e.g. red-green) or four levels (e.g. gray-bronce-silver-gold). Note that Measures without a goal are represented white. The percentages could be beween 0 and unlimited (i.e. above 100%).

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Parent Goal
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: You can create a hierarchy of goals by linking the sub-goals to the summary goal. The measures are automatically rolled up

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: System Registration
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The System Registration helps Adempiere to help the installed base

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Verification Info
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The field contains additional information how the EMail Address has been verified

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Footer Center
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Content of the center portion of the footer.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Footer Left
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Content of the left portion of the footer.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Footer Right
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Content of the right portion of the footer.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Header Right
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Content of the right portion of the header.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Split when Difference
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Split document when there is a difference
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If the confirmation contains differences, the original document is split allowing the original document (shipment) to be processed and updating Inventory - and the newly created document for handling the dispute at a later time. Until the confirmation is processed, the inventory is not updated.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: B.Partner Flat Discount
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Use flat discount defined on Business Partner Level
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: For calculation of the discount, use the discount defined on Business Partner Level

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Suppress Null
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Suppress columns or elements with NULL value
AD_ELEMENT.HELP:
If a Form entry is NULL and if selected, the field (including label) is not printed.
If all elements in a table column are NULL and if selected, the column is not printed.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Micr
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Combination of routing no, account and check no
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Micr number is the combination of the bank routing number, account number and check number

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Original Transaction ID
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Original Transaction ID is used for reversing transactions and indicates the transaction that has been reversed.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Achieved
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Achieved checkbox indicates if this goal has been achieved.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Reverse Local Address Lines
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Print Local Address in reverse Order
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If NOT selected the local sequence is Address 1, Address 2, Address 3, Address 4, City/Region/Postal, Country. If selected the local sequence is Country, City/Region/Postal, Address 4, Address 3, Address 2, Address 1. The sequence of City/Region/Postal is determined by the local address format.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Reverse Address Lines
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If NOT selected the sequence is Address 1, Address 2, Address 3, Address 4, City/Region/Postal, Country. If selected the sequence is Country, City/Region/Postal, Address 4, Address 3, Address 2, Address 1. The sequence of City/Region/Postal is determined by the address format.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Local Address Format
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Format for printing this Address locally
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The optional Local Address Print format defines the format to be used when this address prints for the Country. If defined, this format is used for printing the address for the country rather then the standard address format. The following notations are used: @C@=City @P@=Postal @A@=PostalAdd @R@=Region

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Address 3
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Address 2 provides additional address information for an entity. It can be used for building location, apartment number or similar information.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Allowed to be Published
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: You allow to publish the information, not just statistical summary info

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Can Export
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Users with this role can export data
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: You can restrict the ability to export data from Adempiere.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Running Total
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: A running total creates a sum at the end of a page and on the top of the next page for all colums, which have a Sum function. You should define running total only once per format.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: XY Position
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: This function positions for the next print operation

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Standard Phase
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Standard Phase of the Project Type
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Phase of the project with standard performance information with standard work

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Project Print Format
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Standard Project Print Format

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Project Balance
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The project balance is the sum of all invoices and payments

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Committed Quantity
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The commitment amount is independent from the planned amount. You would use the planned amount for your realistic estimation, which might be higher or lower than the commitment amount.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Download URL
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Semicolon separated list of URLs to be downloaded or distributed

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Can Report
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Users with this role can create reports
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: You can restrict the ability to report on data.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Calculate Maximim (?)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Calculate the Maximum (?) of the data if the field is numeric, otherwise maximum length of the field.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Cash Book Receipt
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Cash Book Receipt Account identifies the account to be used for general, non itemized cash book receipts.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Withholding
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Withholding Account indicates the account used to record withholdings.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Calendar
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Calendar uniquely identifies an accounting calendar. Multiple calendars can be used. For example you may need a standard calendar that runs from Jan 1 to Dec 31 and a fiscal calendar that runs from July 1 to June 30.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Conversion Rate
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Conversion Rate defines the rate (multiply or divide) to use when converting a source currency to an accounting currency.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Country
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Country defines a Country. Each Country must be defined before it can be used in any document.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Currency
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Indicates the Currency to be used when processing or reporting on this record

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Format Type
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The print format type determines what will be printed.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Request History
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Old values

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Request Processor
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Processor for Requests

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Amt in Words
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Amount in words will be printed.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Address 4
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Address 4 provides additional address information for an entity. It can be used for building location, apartment number or similar information.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Just Migrated
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Value set by Migration for post-Migation tasks.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Workflow Type
