AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The type of workflow determines how the workflow is started.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Account Sign
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Indicates the Natural Sign of the Account as a Debit or Credit
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Indicates if the expected balance for this account should be a Debit or a Credit. If set to Natural, the account sign for an asset or expense account is Debit Sign (i.e. negative if a credit balance).

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Callout
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Fully qualified class names and method - separated by semicolons
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: A Callout allow you to create Java extensions to perform certain tasks always after a value changed. Callouts should not be used for validation but consquences of a user selecting a certain value. The callout is a Java class implementing org.compiere.model.Callout and a method name to call. Example: "org.compiere.model.CalloutRequest.copyText" instanciates the class "CalloutRequest" and calls the method "copyText". You can have multiple callouts by separating them via a semicolon

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Duration Limit
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Maximum (critical) Duration for time management purposes (e.g. starting an escalation procedure, etc.) in Duration Units.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Error Reporting
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: To automate error reporting, submit errors to Adempiere. Only error (stack trace) information is submitted (no data or confidential information). It helps us to react faster and proactively. If you have a support contract, we will you inform about corrective measures. This functionality is experimental at this point.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Error Trace
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Java Trace Info

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Attribute Set Instance
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The values of the actual Product Attribute Instances. The product level attributes are defined on Product level.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Attribute Value
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Individual value of a product attribute (e.g. green, large, ..)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Lot
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The individual Lot of a Product

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Lot Control
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Definition to create Lot numbers for Products

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Serial No Control
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Definition to create Serial numbers for Products

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Print Label
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Format for printing Labels

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Print Label Line
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Format of the line on a Label

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Session
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Online or Web Session Information

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Project Type
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Type of the project with optional phases of the project with standard performance information

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Recurring
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Recurring Documents

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Recurring Run
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: History of Recurring Document Generation

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Copy From
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Copy From Record

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Invoice Partner
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If empty the shipment business partner will be invoiced

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Complete
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Indication that this is complete

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Label Width
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Physical Width of the Label

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Attribute Search
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Attributes are specific to a Product Attribute Set (e.g. Size for T-Shirts: S,M,L). If you have multiple attributes and want to search under a common sttribute, you define a search sttribute. Example: have one Size search attribute combining the values of all different sizes (Size for Dress Shirt XL,L,M,S,XS). The Attribute Search allows you to have all values available for selection. This eases the maintenance of the individual product attribute.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Invoice Payment Schedule
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Invoice Payment Schedule determines when partial payments are due.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Payment Schedule
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Information when parts of the payment are due

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Counter
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Number counter

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Any Location From
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Match any value of the Location From segment
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If selected, any value of the account segment will match. If not selected, but no value of the accounting segment is selected, the matched value must be null (i.e. not defined).

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Use Beta Functions
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Enable the use of Beta Functionality
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The exact scope of Beta Functionality is listed in the release note. It is usually not recommended to enable Beta functionality in production environments.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: New EMail Address
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Enter new EMail Address - not changed if empty

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: New EMail User ID
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Enter new User ID of your internal EMail System - not changed if empty

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Purchase Quantity
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: This quantity is used in the Purchase Order to the Supplier
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: When multiple quantities are used in an Request for Quotation, the selected Quantity is used for generating the purchase order. If none selected the lowest number is used.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Quote All Quantities
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Suppliers are requested to provide responses for all quantities
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If selected, the response to the Request for Quotation needs to have a price for all Quantities

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Selected Winner
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The resonse is the selected winner
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The resonse is the selected winner. If selected on Response level, the line selections are ignored.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Document Type Note
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Optional note of a document type

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Day Slot
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Resource is only available on certain days

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Multi Lingual Documents
AD_ELEMENT.HELP:
If selected, you enable multi lingual documents and need to maintain translations for entities used in documents (examples: Products, Payment Terms, ...).
Please note, that the base language is always English.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Set NL Position
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: When enabled, the current x (horizontal) Position before printing the item is saved. The next New Line will use the saved x (horizontal) Position, enabling to print data in columns. The setting is not restricted to an area (header, content, footer), allowing to align information also with Header and Footer with the Content.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Subject
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The subject of the mail message

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Inventory Revaluation
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Inventory Revaluation Account identifies the account used to records changes in inventory value due to currency revaluation.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Project Line
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Task or step in a project
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Project Line indicates a unique project line.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Replication
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Data Replication Target Details. Maintained on the central server.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Active
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The record is active in the system
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: There are two methods of making records unavailable in the system: One is to delete the record, the other is to de-activate the record. A de-activated record is not available for selection, but available for reports. There are two reasons for de-activating and not deleting records: (1) The system requires the record for audit purposes. (2) The record is referenced by other records. E.g., you cannot delete a Business Partner, if there are invoices for this partner record existing. You de-activate the Business Partner and prevent that this record is used for future entries.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Greeting
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Greeting identifies the greeting to print on correspondence.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Import Error Message
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Import Error Message displays any error messages generated during the import process.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Imported
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Imported check box indicates if this import has been processed.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Quantity based
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Trade discount break level based on Quantity (not value)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The calculation of the trade discount level is based on the quantity of the order and not the value amount of the order

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Planned Quantity
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Planned Quantity indicates the anticipated quantity for this project or project line

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Distribution List
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Distribution Lists allow to distribute products to a selected list of partners
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Distribution list contain business partners and a distribution quantity or ratio for creating Orders

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Distribution List Line
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Distribution List Line with Business Partner and Quantity/Percentage
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The distribution can be based on Ratio, fixed quantity or both. If the ratio and quantity is not 0, the quantity is calculated based on the ratio, but with the Quantity as a minimum.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: RMA
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: A Return Material Authorization may be required to accept returns and to create Credit Memos

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: RMA Line
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Detail information about the returned goods

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Accept Diners
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Indicates if Diner's Club Cards are accepted

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Payment Processor
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Payment Processor indicates the processor to be used for electronic payments

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Bank Account Type
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Bank Account Type field indicates the type of account (savings, checking etc) this account is defined as.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Support Expires
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Date when the Adempiere support expires
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Check http://www.adempiere.org for support options

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Header Left
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Content of the left portion of the header.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Min Guarantee Days
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: When selecting batch/products with a guarantee date, the minimum left guarantee days for automatic picking. You can pick any batch/product manually.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Post Processing
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Process SQL after executing the query
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Could be Update/Delete/etc. statement

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Pre Processing
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Process SQL before executing the query
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Could be Update/Delete/etc. statement

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Std Cost Amount Sum
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Current cumulative amount for calculating the standard cost difference based on (actual) invoice price

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Planned Margin %
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Project's planned margin as a percentage
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Planned Margin Percentage indicates the anticipated margin percentage for this project or project line

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: BP Search Key
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Search Key of Business Partner

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Confirmed
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Resource assignment is confirmed

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Time Report
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Line is a time report only (no expense)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The line contains only time information

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Time Slot
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Resource is only available at certain times

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Escalated
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Escalated checkbox indicates that this request has been escalated or raised in importance.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Payment Discount Revenue
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Indicates the account to be charged for payment discount revenues.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: All Nodes
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If selected, all Nodes must be in the tree.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Break Discount %
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Trade Discount in Percent for the break level
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Trade Discount in Percent for the break level

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Break Value
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Low Value of trade discount break level
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Starting Quantity or Amount Value for break level

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Min Shelf Life %
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Minimum Shelf Life in percent based on Product Instance Guarantee Date
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Miminum Shelf Life of products with Guarantee Date instance. If > 0 you cannot select products with a shelf life ((Guarantee Date-Today) / Guarantee Days) less than the minum shelf life, unless you select "Show All"

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Line Margin
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Margin of the line - Planned Amount minus Costs

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Included Column
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Column determining if a Table Column is included in Ordering
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If a Included Column is defined, it decides, if a column is active in the ordering - otherwise it is determined that the Order Column has a value of one or greater

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Print Color
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Color used for printing and display
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Colors used for printing and display

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Print Font
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Font used for printing

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: System Element
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: System Element enables the central maintenance of column description and help.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The System Element allows for the central maintenance of help, descriptions and terminology for a database column.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Field
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Field identifies a field on a database table.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Partner Parent
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The parent (organization) of the Business Partner for reporting purposes.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Overwrite Campaign
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Overwrite the account segment Campaign with the value specified
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If not overwritten, the value of the original account combination is used. If selected, but not specified, the segment is set to null.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Overwrite Location From
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Overwrite the account segment Location From with the value specified
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If not overwritten, the value of the original account combination is used. If selected, but not specified, the segment is set to null.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Send EMail
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Send emails with document attached (e.g. Invoice, Delivery Note, etc.)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: List Sources
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: List the Source Accounts for Summary Accounts selected

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: List Transactions
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: List the transactions of the report source lines

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Account Country
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Account Country Name

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Instance Attribute
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The product attribute is specific to the instance (like Serial No, Lot or Guarantee Date)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If selected, the individual instance of the product has this attribute - like the individual Serial or Lot Numbers or Guarantee Date of a product instance. If not selected, all instances of the product share the attribute (e.g. color=green).

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Included Tab
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Included Tab in this Tab (Master Dateail)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: You can include a Tab in a Tab. If displayed in single row record, the included tab is displayed as multi-row table.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Function BG Color
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Background color of a function row

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Function Color
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Foreground color of a function row

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Graph Type
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Type of graph to be painted
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Type of graph to be painted

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Header Row Font
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Font of the table header row

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Old Password
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Old Password is required if you are not a System Administrator

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Source Balance
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Source Balance Amount indicates the balance amount for this line in the source currency.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Join Element
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Semantics for multiple incoming Transitions for a Node/Activity. AND joins all concurrent threads - XOR requires one thread (no synchronization).

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Split Element
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Semantics for multiple outgoing Transitions for a Node/Activity. AND represents multiple concurrent threads - XOR represents the first transition with a true Transaition condition.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Registration
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: User Registration of an Asset

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Registration Attribute
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Define the individual values for the Asset Registration

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Accounted Amount
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Amount Balance in Currency of Accounting Schema

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Update Balances
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Update Accounting Balances first (not required for subsequent runs)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: XY Separator
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The separator between the X and Y function.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Web Parameter 3
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The parameter could be used in the JSP page for variables like logos, passwords, URLs or entire HTML blocks. The access is via ctx.webParam3 - By default, it is positioned at the end in the menu column with 130 pixel width.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Web Parameter 4
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The parameter could be used in the JSP page for variables like logos, passwords, URLs or entire HTML blocks. The access is via ctx.webParam4 - By default, it is positioned on the left side of the footer with 130 pixel width.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Web Order EMail
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: EMail address to receive notifications when web orders were processed
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: When processig a web order, a confirmation is sent to the EMail addess of the customer from the request EMail address copying this email address when entered.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: RfQ Response
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Request for Quotation Response from a potential Vendor
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Request for Quotation Response from a potential Vendor

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Transition Condition
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Optional restriction of transition of one node to the next

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Node Transition
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Next Nodes Tab defines the order or Nodes or Steps in a Workflow.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Wait Time
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Time in minutes to be suspended (sleep)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Workflow Key
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Key of the Workflow to start

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Accounted Balance
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Account Balance Amount indicates the transaction amount converted to this organization's accounting currency

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Resolution
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Resolution status (e.g. Fixed, Rejected, ..)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Overwrite User1
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Overwrite the account segment User 1 with the value specified
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If not overwritten, the value of the original account combination is used. If selected, but not specified, the segment is set to null.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Overwrite User2
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Overwrite the account segment User 2 with the value specified
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If not overwritten, the value of the original account combination is used. If selected, but not specified, the segment is set to null.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Any Activity
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Match any value of the Activity segment
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If selected, any value of the account segment will match. If not selected, but no value of the accounting segment is selected, the matched value must be null (i.e. not defined).

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Any Organization
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Match any value of the Organization segment
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If selected, any value of the account segment will match. If not selected, but no value of the accounting segment is selected, the matched value must be null (i.e. not defined).

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Custom Prefix
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The prefix listed are ignored as customization for database or entity migration

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Overwrite Account
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Overwrite the account segment Account with the value specified
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If not overwritten, the value of the original account combination is used. If selected, but not specified, the segment is set to null.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: UOM Code
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Unit of Measure Code indicates the EDI X12 Code Data Element 355 (Unit or Basis for Measurement)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Sales Representative
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Indicates if the business partner is a sales representative or company agent
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Sales Rep checkbox indicates if this business partner is a sales representative. A sales representative may also be an emplyee, but does not need to be.
AD_ELEMENT.PO_HELP: The Sales Rep checkbox indicates if this business partner is a company agent. A company agent may also be an emplyee, but does not need to be.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Date received
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Date Received indicates the date that product was received.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Description
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Optional short description of the record
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: A description is limited to 255 characters.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Measure
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Measure identifies a concrete, measurable indicator of performance. For example, sales dollars, prospects contacted.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Order Reference
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Transaction Reference Number (Sales Order, Purchase Order) of your Business Partner
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The business partner order reference is the order reference for this specific transaction; Often Purchase Order numbers are given to print on Invoices for easier reference. A standard number can be defined in the Business Partner (Customer) window.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Realized Gain Acct
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Realized Gain Account indicates the account to be used when recording gains achieved from currency revaluation that have been realized.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Realized Loss Acct
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Realized Loss Account indicates the account to be used when recording losses incurred from currency revaluation that have yet to be realized.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Record ID
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Record ID is the internal unique identifier of a record. Please note that zooming to the record may not be successful for Orders, Invoices and Shipment/Receipts as sometimes the Sales Order type is not known.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Reference
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Reference displays the source document number.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Accept AMEX
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Indicates if American Express Cards are accepted

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Next Line
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If not selected, the item is printed on the same line

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Order by
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The records are ordered by the value of this column. If a column is used for grouping, it needs to be included in the sort order as well.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Function Column
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Function Column indicates that the column will be overridden with a function

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Actual Amount
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Actual amount indicates the agreed upon amount for a document.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Actual Quantity
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Actual Quantity indicates the quantity as referenced on a document.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Cash Journal
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Cash Journal uniquely identifies a Cash Journal. The Cash Journal will record transactions for the cash bank account

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Over/Under Payment
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Overpayments (negative) are unallocated amounts and allow you to receive money for more than the particular invoice. Underpayments (positive) is a partial payment for the invoice. You do not write off the unpaid amount.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Statement difference
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Difference between statement ending balance and actual ending balance
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Statement Difference reflects the difference between the Statement Ending Balance and the Actual Ending Balance.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Location comment
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Additional comments or remarks concerning the location

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Training Class
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: A scheduled class

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Training
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The training may have multiple actual classes

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Document Directory
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Directory for documents from the application server
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Directory to store documents by the application server. The path/directory is accessed by the application server and may not be accessible to clients.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Invoice Mail Text
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Email text used for sending invoices
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Standard email template used to send invoices as attachments.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Print Label Suffix
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The label text to be printed on a document or correspondence after the field
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Label to be printed indicates the name that will be printed on a document or correspondence after the field. The max length is 60 characters.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Sql FROM
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Select Clause indicates the SQL FROM clause to use for selecting the record for a measure calculation. It can have JOIN clauses. Do not include the FROM itself.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Freight
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Freight Rate for Shipper

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Freight Category
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Freight Categories are used to calculate the Freight for the Shipper selected

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: CVV Match
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Credit Card Verification Code was matched

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Ship Date
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Actual Date/Time of Shipment (pick up)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Internal Users

AD_ELEMENT.HELP: You can purchase professioal support from Adempiere, Inc. or their partners. See http://www.adempiere.com for details.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Swipe
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Track 1 and 2 of the Credit Card
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Swiped information for Credit Card Presence Transactions

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Alert

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Alert Message
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The message of the email sent for the alert

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Enforce Role Security

AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The remote organization used for data replication. If not selected, all organizations are replicated/synchronized.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Request EMail
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: EMail address to send automated mails from or receive mails for automated processing (fully qualified)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: EMails for requests, alerts and escalation are sent from this email address as well as delivery information if the sales rep does not have an email account. The address must be filly qualified (e.g. joe.smith@company.com) and should be a valid address.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Org Column
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Organization Column indicates the organization to be used in calculating this measurement.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Any Trx Organization
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Match any value of the Transaction Organization segment
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If selected, any value of the account segment will match. If not selected, but no value of the accounting segment is selected, the matched value must be null (i.e. not defined).

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Alert Subject
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The subject of the email message sent for the alert

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Mail Text 2

AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Mail Text indicates the text used for mail messages.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Insert Record
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The user can insert a new Record
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If not selected, the user cannot create a new Record. This is automatically disabled, if the Tab is Read Only.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Advanced Tab
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The tab with advanced functionality is only displayed, if enabled in Tools>Preference.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Null Columns
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Null values are used for showing "no change"

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Relative Priority
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Where inventory should be picked from first
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Relative Priority indicates the location to pick from first if an product is stored in more than one location. (100 = highest priority, 0 = lowest). For outgoing shipments, the location is picked with the highest priority where the entire quantity can be shipped from. If there is no location, the location with the highest priority is used. The Priority is ignored for products with Guarantee Date (always the oldest first) or if a speific instance is selected. Incoming receipts are stored at the location with the hoghest priority, if not explicitly selected.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Only If BP has Balance
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Include only if Business Partner has outstanding Balance

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Encrypted
AD_ELEMENT.HELP:
Display encryption (in Window/Tab/Field) - all characters are displayed as '*' - in the database it is stored in clear text. You will not be able to report on these columns.
Data storage encryption (in Table/Column) - data is stored encrypted in the database (dangerous!) and you will not be able to report on those columns. Independent from Display encryption.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Obscure
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Type of obscuring the data (limiting the display)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Platform Info

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Running Total Lines

AD_ELEMENT.HELP: When you want to print running totals, enter the number of lines per page after you want to create a running total line and page break. You should define running total only once per format.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Description Column

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Dependent Entities
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Also check access in dependent entities
AD_ELEMENT.HELP:
Also dependent entities are included. Please be aware, that enabling this rule has severe consequences and that this is only wanted in some circumstances.

Example Rule: "Include Payment Term Immediate with Dependent Entities"
Primary effect: users with this role can only select the payment term Immediate
Secondary effect (dependent entities): users with this role can see only invoices/orders with the payment term immediate.
