AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Document Value Logic
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Logic to determine Workflow Start - If true, a workflow process is started for the document
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: You can enter simple logic using variables like @Created@=@Updated@, which fires, when a record is created. If you need to evaluate also values of other records, you need to use SQL logic and need to prefix this logic with "SQL=". Example: start a Order verify workflow, when a business partner ordered something and is over the credit limit "SQL=EXISTS (SELECT * FROM C_BPartner bp WHERE C_Order. C_BPartner_ID=bp. C_BPartner_ID AND SO_CreditUsed > SO_CreditLimit)". Note that the SQL based logic checks for duplicate workflows (i.e. a workflow is started only once per record).

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Scrapped Quantity
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The Quantity scrapped due to QA issues

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Any Location To
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Match any value of the Location To segment
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If selected, any value of the account segment will match. If not selected, but no value of the accounting segment is selected, the matched value must be null (i.e. not defined).

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Any Campaign
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Match any value of the Campaign segment
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If selected, any value of the account segment will match. If not selected, but no value of the accounting segment is selected, the matched value must be null (i.e. not defined).

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Any Bus.Partner
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Match any value of the Business Partner segment
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If selected, any value of the account segment will match. If not selected, but no value of the accounting segment is selected, the matched value must be null (i.e. not defined).

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Any Account
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Match any value of the Account segment
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If selected, any value of the account segment will match. If not selected, but no value of the accounting segment is selected, the matched value must be null (i.e. not defined).

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Bank Routing No Format
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Format of the Bank Routing Number

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Web Parameter 6
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The parameter could be used in the JSP page for variables like logos, passwords, URLs or entire HTML blocks. The access is via ctx.webParam6 - By default, it is positioned on the right side of the footer.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Calculate Minimum (?)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Calculate the Minimum (?) of the data if the field is numeric, otherwise minimum length of the field.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: New EMail User PW
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Enter new User Password of your internal EMail System - not changed if empty

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: New Password
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Enter the new password - not changed if empty

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Due Date Tolerance
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Tolerance in days between the Date Next Action and the date the request is regarded as overdue
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: When the Date Next Action is passed, the Request becomes Due. After the Due Date Tolerance, the Request becomes Overdue.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Workflow Activity
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Workflow Activity is the actual Workflow Node in a Workflow Process instance

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: EFT Memo
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Information from EFT media

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Currency Type
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Currency Conversion Rate Type lets you define different type of rates, e.g. Spot, Corporate and/or Sell/Buy rates.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Project Category
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Project Category determines the behavior of the project: General - no special accounting, e.g. for Presales or general tracking Service - no special accounting, e.g. for Service/Charge projects Work Order - creates Project/Job WIP transactions - ability to issue material Asset - create Project Asset transactions - ability to issue material

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Recurring Type
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The type of document to be generated

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Old Value
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Old data overwritten in the field

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Target Quantity
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Quantity which should have been received

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Linked Organization
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The Business Partner is another Organization for explicit Inter-Org transactions
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The business partner is another organization in the system. So when performing transactions, the counter-document is created automatically. Example: You have BPartnerA linked to OrgA and BPartnerB linked to OrgB. If you create a sales order for BPartnerB in OrgA a purchase order is created for BPartnerA in OrgB. This allows to have explicit documents for Inter-Org transactions.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Scheduler Log
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Result of the execution of the Scheduler
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Result of the execution of the Scheduler

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Workflow Processor
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Workflow Processor Server

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Time Type
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Differentiate time types for reporting purposes (In parallel to Activities)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: User Element 2
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: A user defined accounting element referres to a Adempiere table. This allows to use any table content as an accounting dimension (e.g. Project Task). Note that User Elements are optional and are populated from the context of the document (i.e. not requested)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Working Time
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Amount of time the performer of the activity needs to perform the task in Duration Unit

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Start Mode
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: How is the execution of an activity triggered. Automatic are triggered implicitly by the system, Manual explicitly by the User.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Finish Mode
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: How the system operated at the end of an activity. Automatic implies return when the invoked applications finished control - Manual the user has to explicitly terminate the activity.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Always Updateable
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The column is always updateable, even if the record is not active or processed
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If selected and if the winow / tab is not read only, you can always update the column. This might be useful for comments, etc.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Read Only Logic
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Logic to determine if field is read only (applies only when field is read-write)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP:
format := {expression} [{logic} {expression}]
expression := @{context}@{operand}{value} or @{context}@{operand}{value}
logic := {|}|{&}
context := any global or window context
value := strings or numbers
logic operators := AND or OR with the previous result from left to right
operand := eq{=}, gt{>}, le{<}, not{~^!}
Examples:
@AD_Table_ID@=14 | @Language@!GERGER
@PriceLimit@>10 | @PriceList@>@PriceActual@
@Name@>J
Strings may be in single quotes (optional)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Details/Source First
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Details and Sources are printed before the Line

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Media Size
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Java Media Size. Example: "MediaSize.ISO.A4" (the package javax.print.attribute.standard is assumed). If you define your own media size, use the fully qualified name. If the pattern for your language is not correct, please create a Adempiere support request with the correct information

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Commitment Type
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Create Commitment and/or Reservations for Budget Control
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Posting Type Commitments is created when posting Purchase Orders; The Posting Type Revervation is created when posting Requisitions. This is used for bugetary control.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Sub Account
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Element Value (e.g. Account) may have optional sub accounts for further detail. The sub account is dependent on the value of the account, so a further specification. If the sub-accounts are more or less the same, consider using another accounting dimension.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: User Element 1
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: A user defined accounting element referres to a Adempiere table. This allows to use any table content as an accounting dimension (e.g. Project Task). Note that User Elements are optional and are populated from the context of the document (i.e. not requested)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Prepayment
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Payments not allocated to an invoice with a charge are posted to Unallocated Payments. When setting this flag, the payment is posted to the Customer or Vendor Prepayment account.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: BBAN
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Basic (or Domestic) Bank Account Number is used in Bank transfers (see also IBAN). For details see ISO 13616 and http://www.ecbs.org/

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Material Policy
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Material Movement Policy determines how the stock is flowing (FiFo or LiFo) if a specific Product Instance was not selected. The policy can not contradict the costing method (e.g. FiFo movement policy and LiFo costing method).

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Group
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Group of requests (e.g. version numbers, responsibility, ...)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Category
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Category or Topic of the Request

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Status
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Status if the request (open, closed, investigating, ..)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Auto Archive
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Enable and level of automatic Archive of documents
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Adempiere allows to automatically create archives of Documents (e.g. Invoices) or Reports. You view the archived material with the Archive Viewer

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Product Used
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Invoicing uses the Product used.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Related Request
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Request related to this request

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Mail Text 3
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Optional third text part used for Mail message
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Mail Text indicates the text used for mail messages.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Web Store
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: A Web Store of the Client

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Web Store EMail
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: EMail address used as the sender (From)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The EMail address is used to send mails to useres of the web store

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: EFT Statement Reference
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Information from EFT media

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Workflow Block
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: A workflow execution block is optional and allows all work to be performed in a single transaction. If one step (node activity) fails, the entire work is rolled back.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Workflow Event Audit
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Workflow Process Activity Event Audit Information
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: History of chenges ov the Workflow Process Activity

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Workflow Node Parameter
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Parameter for the execution of the Workflow Node

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Workflow Process
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Instance of a workflow execution

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Workflow Process Data
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Context information of the workflow process and activity

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Workflow Responsible
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The ultimate responsibility for a workflow is with an actual user. The Workflow Responsible allows to define ways to find that actual User.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Accept Direct Debit
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Accept Direct Debit transactions. Direct Debits are initiated by the vendor who has permission to deduct amounts from the payee's account.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Line Stroke Type
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Type of the line printed

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Header Stroke
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Width of the Header Line Stroke
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The width of the header line stroke (line thickness) in Points.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Header Stroke Type
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Type of the Header Line Stroke
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Type of the line printed

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Last Alert
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Date when last alert were sent
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The last alert date is updated when a reminder email is sent

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Costing Level
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The lowest level to accumulate Costing Information
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If you want to maintain different costs per organization (warehouse) or per Batch/Lot, you need to make sure that you define the costs for each of the organizations or batch/lot. The Costing Level is defined per Accounting Schema and can be overwritten by Product Category and Accounting Schema.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Post Immediately
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Post the accounting immediately for testing
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If selected, the accouning consequences are immediately generated when completing a doecument. Otherwise the document is posted by a batch process. You should select this only if you are testing,

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Cost Immediately
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If selected, costs are updated immediately when a Cost Detail record is created (by matching or shipping). Otherwise the costs are updated by batch or when the costs are needed for posting. You should select this only if you are testing,

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Create Change Request
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Create automatically a Product Bill of Material (Engineering) Change Request when the Request Group references a Product BOM

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: WebStore Password
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Password of the Web Store EMail address
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Password to connect to the Mail Server

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: BOM Component
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Bill of Material Compoment determines what products, services and outside processing is included in producing the Product. It references the operation and determines it's sequence.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Cost Queue
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Note thet the cost queue may not be the same as the physical movement cost queue due to differences in costing level and warehouse priority.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Post Services Separately
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Differentiate between Services and Product Receivable/Payables
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If selcted, you will post service related revenue to a different receiveables account and service related cost to a different payables account.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Error
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: An Error occured in the execution

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Published
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The Topic is published and can be viewed
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If not selected, the Topic is not visible to the general public.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Quote Total Amt
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The respnse can have just the total amount for the RfQ
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If not selected, the resonse must be provided per line

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Minimum Quantity
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Minimum quantity for the business partner
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If a minimum quantity is defined, and the quantity is based on the percentage is lower, the minimum quantity is used.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Payment BPartner
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Business Partner responsible for the payment

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Fill Shape
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Fill the shape with the color selected

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Shape Type
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Type of the shape to be painted

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Search Shipment/Receipt
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Material Shipment / Receipt

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: System Issue
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Automatically created or manually entered System Issue
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: System Issues are created to speed up the resolution of any system related issues (potential bugs). If enabled, they are automatically reported to Adempiere. No data or confidential information is transferred.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Vanilla System
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The system was NOT compiled from Source - i.e. standard distribution
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: You may have customizations, like additional columns, tables, etc - but no code modifications which require compiling from source.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: EFT Statement Line Date
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Electronic Funds Transfer Statement Line Date
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Information from EFT media

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Bank Statement Loader
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Definition of Bank Statement Loader (SWIFT, OFX)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The loader definition privides the parameters to load bank statements from EFT formats like SWIFT (MT940) or OFX

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Workflow Activity Result
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Result of the Workflow Process Activity
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Activity Result of the execution of the Workflow Process Instrance

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: EFT Check No
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Information from EFT media

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: EFT Currency
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Information from EFT media

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: EFT Effective Date
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Information from EFT media

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: File Name
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Name of the local file or URL
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Name of a file in the local directory space - or URL (file://.., http://.., ftp://..)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Financial Institution ID
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The ID of the Financial Institution / Bank
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Depending on the loader, it might require a ID of the financial institution

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Show Accounting
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Users with this role can see accounting information
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: This allows to prevent access to any accounting information.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Line Total
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Total line amount

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Attribute Value
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Adempiere converts the (string) field values to the attribute data type. Booleans (Yes-No) may have the values "true" and "false", the date format is YYYY-MM-DD

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Subflow Execution
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Mode how the sub-workflow is executed

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Waiting Time
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Amount of time needed to prepare the performance of the task on Duration Units

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Attribute Name
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Identifier of the attribute

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Duration
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Expected (normal) Length of time for the execution

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Duration Unit
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Unit to define the length of time for the execution

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Line Work Complete
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Date when line work is (planned to be) complete

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Mark 4 Percent
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Percentage up to this color is used
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Example 9999 - e.g., if Mark 3 is 100 - this color is used above 100%

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Explicit Cost Adjustment
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If selected, landed costs are posted to the account in the line and then this posting is reversed by the postings to the cost adjustment accounts. If not selected, it is directly posted to the cost adjustment accounts.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Cost Type
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Type of Cost (e.g. Current, Plan, Future)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: You can define multiple cost types. A cost type selected in an Accounting Schema is used for accounting.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Org Assignment
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Assignment to the transacation organization (cost center).

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Project Task
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Actual Project Task in a Phase
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: A Project Task in a Project Phase represents the actual work.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Standard Task
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Standard Project Task in a Project Phase with standard effort

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Commitment is Ceiling
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The commitment amount/quantity is the chargeable ceiling
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The commitment amount and quantity is the maximum amount and quantity to be charged. Ignored, if the amount or quantity is zero.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Closed Status
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: This allows to mave multiple closed status

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Close Date
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Start Date indicates the last or final date

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Open Status
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: This allows to have the three generat situations of "not open" - "open" - "closed"

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Timeout in Days
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Timeout in Days to change Status automatically
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: After the number of days of inactivity, the status is changed automatically to the Next Status. If no Next Status is defined, the status is not changed.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Web Can Update
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Entry can be updated from the Web

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Std User Workflow
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If selected, only documents with an open status (drafted, in progress, approved, rejected, invalid) and standard user actions (prepare, complete, approve, reject) are allowed to continue. Use this to prevent having to define details on how automatic processes (unlock, invalidate, post, re-activate) and when the document is closed for normal user action (completed, waiting, closed, voided, reversed).

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Default Parameter
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The default value can be a variable like @#Date@

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Payment Location
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Location of the Business Partner responsible for the payment

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Personal Lock
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Allow users with role to lock access to personal records
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If enabled, the user with the role can prevent access of others to personal records. If a record is locked, only the user or people who can read personal locked records can see the record.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Personal Access
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Allow access to all personal records
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Users of this role have access to all records locked as personal.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Currency Type Key
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Key value for the Currency Conversion Rate Type
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The date type key for the conversion of foreign currency transactions

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Pay Schedule valid
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Is the Payment Schedule is valid
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Payment Schedules allow to have multiple due dates.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Reproducible
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Problem can re reproduced in Gardenworld
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The problem occurs also in the standard distribution in the demo client Gardenworld.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Task Status
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Completion Rate and Status of the Task

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Complete Plan
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Date when the task is planned to be complete

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Quantity Plan
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Planned Quantity

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Mark 1 Percent
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Percentage up to this color is used
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Example 50 - i.e. below 50% this color is used

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Confirm Query Records
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Require Confirmation if more records will be returned by the query (If not defined 500)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Enter the numer of records the query wil return without confirmation to avoid unnecessary system load. If 0, the system default of 500 is used.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Model Validation Classes
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: List of data model validation classes separated by ;
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: List of classes implementing the interface org.compiere.model.ModelValidator, separaed by semicolon. The class is called for the client and alows to validate documents in the prepare stage and monitor model changes.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Date Pattern
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Option Date pattern in Java notation. Examples: dd.MM.yyyy - dd/MM/yyyy If the pattern for your language is not correct, please create a Adempiere support request with the correct information

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Decimal Point
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The number notation has a decimal point (no decimal comma)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If selected, Numbers are printed with a decimal point "." - otherwise with a decimal comma ",". The thousand separator is the opposite. If the pattern for your language is not correct, please create a Adempiere support request with the correct information

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Time Pattern
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Option Time pattern in Java notation. Examples: "hh:mm:ss aaa z" - "HH:mm:ss" If the pattern for your language is not correct, please create a Adempiere support request with the correct information

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Relative URL
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Contains the relative URL for the container
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The relative URL is used together with the webproject domain to display the content

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Meta Description
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Meta info describing the contents of the page
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Meta Description tag should contain a short description on the page content

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Auto Due Date Days
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If a due date is not defined and the Auto Due Days ins greater then zero, a due date in the number of days is automatically created.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: User Mail
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Archive of mails sent to users

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Product Download
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Define download for a product. If the product is an asset, the user can download the data.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Create As Active
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: You may want to consider not to automatically make the asset active if you need to get some additional information

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Gross Cost
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Gross Salary or Wage Costs (without Overtime, with Benefits and Employer overhead)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Overtime Amount
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Hourly Amount without Benefits and Employer overhead

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Gross Amount
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Gross Salary or Wage Amount (without Overtime, Benefits and Employer overhead)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Calculated
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The value is calculated by the system
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: You cannot change values maintained by the system.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: jsp URL
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Web URL of the jsp function
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: For the Web UI, define the URL to perform the function (usually a jsp). The URL also can be external to the system.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Other SQL Clause
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Any other complete clause like GROUP BY, HAVING, ORDER BY, etc. after WHERE clause.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Product Description
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Description of the product

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Transaction
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Internal name of the transcation

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Price Match Difference
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Difference between Purchase and Invoice Price per matched line
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The difference between purchase and invoice price may be used for requiring explicit approval if a Price Match Tolerance is defined on Business Partner Group level.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Web Container Type
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: This parameter defines the type of content for this container.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: StructureXML
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Autogenerated Containerdefinition as XML Code

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Web Container Stage
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Web Container Stage contains the staging content like images, text etc.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: A Container defines the abstract level around the content, it defines how the content get's displayed, indexed and stored. The ID is related 1 to 1 to the container ID

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Content HTML
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Contains the content itself as HTML code. Should normally only use basic tags, no real layouting

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Last Checked
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Info when we did the last check
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Info on the last check date

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Last Result
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Contains data on the last check result
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If we ran into errors etc. you will find the details in here

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Media Type
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Defines the media type for the browser
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The browser and the media server need info on the type of content

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Media Server
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Media Server list to which content should get transfered
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: For performance optimization we save media content on static servers

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: News Channel
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: A news channel defines the content base for the RSS feed

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Arc Diameter
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Width of the horizontal/vertical diameter of the arc at the four corners

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: User BP Access
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: User/concat access to Business Partner information and resources
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If on User level, "Full BP Access" is NOT selected, you need to give access explicitly here.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Access Type
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Type of Access of the user/contact to Business Partner information and resources
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If on User level, "Full BP Access" is NOT selected, give access explicitly

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Container Element
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Container element i.e. Headline, Content, Footer etc.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: A container element defines the smalles definition of content, i.e. the headline, the content etc.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Measure Scope
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The scope of the goal can be broken down for initial display. Example: Scope is Year, Display is Month - the goal is entered as a yearly number, the display divides the goal by 12

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Source Warehouse
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If defined, the warehouse selected is used to replenish the product(s)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Replenishment Class
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Custom class to calculate Quantity to Order
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If you select a custom replenishment type, you need to create a class implementing org.compiere.util.ReplenishInterface and set that on warehouse level.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Receivable Services
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Account to post services related Accounts Receivables if you want to differentiate between Services and Product related revenue. This account is only used, if posting to service accounts is enabled in the accounting schema.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Product Operation
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Operations to create the product. Note that the actual used operation and sequence is determined by the BOM Product.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Operation Resource
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Resources for the Operation. You can have multiple resources (e.g. tool, labor) per operation.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: BOM
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The composition of the Product

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Phantom
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Phantom Component are not stored and produced with the product. This is an option to avild maintaining an Engineering and Manufacturing Bill of Materials.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Lead Time Offset
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Optional Lead Time offest before starting production

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Available Amount
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Amount available for allocation for this document

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Image Field
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The image is retrieved from the data column
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Image URL is retrieved from the data column

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: IP Address
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Defines the IP address to transfer data to
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Contains info on the IP address to which we will transfer data

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Link
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: A Link should contain info on how to get to more information

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: News Item / Article
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: News item or article defines base content
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: A news item / article is kind of a teaser for more information on an article

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Publication Date
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Date on which this article will / should get published
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Date on which this article will / should get published

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Container Stage Element
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Container element i.e. Headline, Content, Footer etc.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: A container element defines the smalles definition of content, i.e. the headline, the content etc.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Actual Click Count
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: How many clicks have been counted
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Contains info on the actual click count until now

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Advertisement
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: An Advertisement is something like a banner
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: You could use banner, partner infos, sponsored links etc. as an advertisement

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Special AD Flag
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Do we need to specially mention this ad?
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If we have a block in content where anounce content and also sponsored links we should mention the sponsored ones

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Max Click Count
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Maximum Click Count until banner is deactivated
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: A banner has a maximum number of clicks after which it will get deactivated

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Max Impression Count
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Maximum Impression Count until banner is deactivated
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: A banner has a maximum number of impressions after which it will get deactivated

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Logging
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Do we need to log the banner impressions and clicks? (needs much performance)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: As of performance we should only log banners if really necessary, as this takes a lot of performance

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Start Count Impression
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: For rotation we need a start count
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If we run banners in rotation we always show the one with the min of impressions, so if a new banner is added to impressions we don't want it to show up so often we set a startimpressions value. StartImpression+ActualImpression=CurrentImpression

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Invoice Rule
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Invoice Rule for the project determines how orders (and consequently invoices) are created. The selection on project level can be overwritten on Phase or Task

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Standard Response
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Text blocks to be copied into request response text

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Request Invoice
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The generated invoice for this request
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The optionally generated invoice for the request

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Response Text
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Text block to be copied into request response text

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Inactivity Alert Days
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Send Alert when there is no activity after days (0= no alert)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: An email alert is sent when the request shows no activity for the number of days defined.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Archive
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Depending on the Client Automatic Archive Level documents and reports are saved and available for view.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Fully Qualified Domain Name
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Fully Qualified Domain Name i.e. www.comdivision.com
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: This field contains the so called fully qualified domain name including host and domain, but not anything protocol specific like http or the document path.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Tax Correction
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Determines if/when tax is corrected. Discount could be agreed or granted underpayments; Write-off may be partial or complete write-off.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Web Context
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Unique Web Server Context for this Web Store - will set context-root in application.xml. The web context usually starts with / and needs to be a valid context name (not checked).

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Change the current Setting
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Confirm that you want to change the current setting

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: WebStore User
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: User ID of the Web Store EMail address
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: User ID to connect to the Mail Server

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Subject
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Subject of the EMail

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Message
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Message of the EMail

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Message 2
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Optional second part of the EMail Message
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Message of the EMail

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Inventory Clearing
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Account used for posting matched product (item) expenses (e.g. AP Invoice, Invoice Match). You would use a different account then Product Expense, if you want to differentate service related costs from item related costs. The balance on the clearing account should be zero and accounts for the timing difference between invoice receipt and matching.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Cost Adjustment
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Account used for posting product cost adjustments (e.g. landed costs)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Adjust COGS
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: For Invoice costing methods, you can adjust the cost of goods sold. At the time of shipment, you may not have received the invoice for the receipt or cost adjustments like freight, customs, etc.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: RfQ Response Line Qty
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Request for Quotation Response Line Quantity
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Request for Quotation Response Line Quantity from a potential Vendor

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: RfQ Response Line
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Request for Quotation Response Line from a potential Vendor

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Subscription
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Subscription of a Business Partner of a Product to renew
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Subscription of a Business Partner of a Product to renew

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Confirmed Quantity
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Confirmation of a received quantity

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: In Transit
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Material Movement is in transit - shipped, but not received. The transaction is completed, if confirmed.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Open Balance
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Total Open Balance Amount in primary Accounting Currency
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Total Open Balance Amount is the calculated open item amount for Customer and Vendor activity. If the Balance is below zero, we owe the Business Partner. The amout is used for Credit Management. Invoices and Payment Allocations determine the Open Balance (i.e. not Orders or Payments).

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Overwrite Project
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Overwrite the account segment Project with the value specified
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If not overwritten, the value of the original account combination is used. If selected, but not specified, the segment is set to null.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Message 3
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Optional third part of the EMail Message
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Message of the EMail

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Position Assignment
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Assignemt of Employee (User) to Job Position

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Price Match Tolerance
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: PO-Invoice Match Price Tolerance in percent of the purchase price
AD_ELEMENT.HELP:
Tolerance in Percent of matching the purchase order price to the invoice price. The difference is posted as Invoice Price Tolerance for Standard Costing. If defined, the PO-Invoice match must be explicitly approved, if the matching difference is greater then the tolerance.
Example: if the purchase price is $100 and the tolerance is 1 (percent), the invoice price must be between $99 and 101 to be automatically approved.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Related Partner
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The related Business Partner Acts on behalf of the Business Partner - example the Related Partner pays invoices of the Business Partner - or we pay to the Related Partner for invoices received from the Business Partner

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: RfQ Topic
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: A Request for Quotation Topic allows you to maintain a subscriber list of potential Vendors to respond to RfQs

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: RfQ Line Quantity
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: You may request a quotation for different quantities

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Allocate Oldest First
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Allocate payments to the oldest invoice
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Allocate payments to the oldest invoice. There might be an unallocated amount remaining.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Exclude Auto Delivery
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The product is excluded from generating Shipments. This allows manual creation of shipments for high demand items. If selected, you need to create the shipment manually. But, the item is always included, when the delivery rule of the Order is Force (e.g. for POS). This allows finer granularity of the Delivery Rule Manual.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Fund Restriction
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If defined, you can use the fund only for the accounts selected.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Mail Template
AD_ELEMENT.HELP:
The Mail Template indicates the mail template for return messages. Mail text can include variables. The priority of parsing is User/Contact, Business Partner and then the underlying business object (like Request, Dunning, Workflow object).
So, @Name@ would resolve into the User name (if user is defined defined), then Business Partner name (if business partner is defined) and then the Name of the business object if it has a Name.
For Multi-Lingual systems, the template is translated based on the Business Partner's language selection.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Connection Profile
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: How a Java Client connects to the server(s)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Depending on the connection profile, different protocols are used and tasks are performed on the server rather then the client. Usually the user can select different profiles, unless it is enforced by the User or Role definition. The User level profile overwrites the Role based profile.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Overwrite Activity
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Overwrite the account segment Activity with the value specified
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If not overwritten, the value of the original account combination is used. If selected, but not specified, the segment is set to null.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Difference Document
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Document type for generating in dispute Shipments
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If the confirmation contains differences, the original document is split allowing the original document (shipment) to be processed and updating Inventory - and the newly created document for handling the dispute at a later time. Until the confirmation is processed, the inventory is not updated.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: In Dispute
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The document is in dispute. Use Requests to track details.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: LDAP Domain
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Directory service domain name - e.g. adempiere.org
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If LDAP Host and Domain is specified, the user is authenticated via LDAP. The password in the User table is not used for connecting to Adempiere.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Beta Functionality
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Beta functionality is not fully tested or completed.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Drop Shipment
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Drop Shipments are sent from the Vendor directly to the Customer
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Drop Shipments do not cause any Inventory reservations or movements as the Shipment is from the Vendor's inventory. The Shipment of the Vendor to the Customer must be confirmed.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Goal Restriction
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Restriction of the performance measure to the Organization, Business Partner or Product defined. Example: The performance is only measured for HQ The measure must support the data, otherwise it is ignored.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Restriction Type
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Enter one or more records per Goal Restriction Type (e.g. Org o1, o2)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Benchmark
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Data Series to compare internal performance with (e.g. stock price, ...)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Ratio
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Calculation instruction set for a perfomance ratio

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Measure Data Type
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Type of data - Status or in Time
AD_ELEMENT.HELP:
Status represents values valid at a certain time (e.g. Open Invoices) - No history is maintained.
Time represents a values at a given time (e.g. Invoice Amount on 1/1) - History is maintained

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: LinkURL
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: A Link should contain info on how to get to more information

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Media Item
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Contains media content like images, flash movies etc.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: This table contains all the media content like images, flas movies etc.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Target Frame
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Which target should be used if user clicks?
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Do we want the content to stay in same window, to open up a new one or to place it in a special frame?

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Advertisement Category
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The advertisement category defines a container for ad's like for example all banners used on the homepage in rotation are stored in a category "Banner Homepage" etc.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Overwrite Trx Organuzation
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Overwrite the account segment Transaction Organization with the value specified
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If not overwritten, the value of the original account combination is used. If selected, but not specified, the segment is set to null.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Subscription Type
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Subscription type and renewal frequency

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Response Date
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Date of the Response

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Work Complete
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Date when work is (planned to be) complete

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Work Start
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Date when work is (planned to be) started

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Cost Price
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Price per Unit of Measure including all indirect costs (Freight, etc.)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Optional Purchase Order Line cost price.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Accumulated Amt
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Sum of all amounts

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Accumulated Qty
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Sum of the quantities

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Lost Sales Qty
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: When an order is closed and there is a difference between the ordered quantity and the delivered (invoiced) quantity is the Lost Sales Quantity. Note that the Lost Sales Quantity is 0 if you void an order, so close the order if you want to track lost opportunities. [Void = data entry error - Close = the order is finished]

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Lost Sales Amt
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Amount of lost sales in Invoice Currency

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Margin Amount
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Difference between actual and limit price multiplied by the quantity
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The margin amount is calculated as the difference between actual and limit price multiplied by the quantity

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Confidential Info
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: When entering/updating Requests over the web, the user can mark his info as confidential

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Issue Recommendation
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Recommendations how to fix an Issue
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Recommendations how to fix an Issue

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Issue Status
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Status of an Issue

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Issue Status
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Description of the current status of the issue

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Benchmark Data
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Data Series Point to compare internal performance with (e.g. stock price, ...)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Date
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Date of the Benchmark Data Point

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Value
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Value of the Benchmark Data Point

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Web Project
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: A web project is the main data container for Containers, URLs, Ads, Media etc.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: A web project is the meta definition which will contain later on all data within the Web Content Management Project.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Meta Copyright
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Contains Copyright information for the content
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: This Tag contains detailed information about the content's copyright situation, how holds it for which timeframe etc.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Server Process
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Run this Process on Server only
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Enabling this flag disables to run the process on the client. This potentially decreases the availability.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Client Share
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: For entities with data access level of Client+Organization either force to share the entries or not. Example: Product and Business Partner can be either defined on Client level (shared) or on Org level (not shared). You can define here of Products are always shared (i.e. always created under Organization "*") or if they are not shared (i.e. you cannot enter them with Organization "*")

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Share Type
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Defines if a table is shared within a client or not.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Reporting Hierarchy
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Optional Reporting Hierarchy - If not selected the default hierarchy trees are used.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Reporting Hierarchy allows you to select different Hierarchies/Trees for the report. Accounting Segments like Organization, Account, Product may have several hierarchies to accomodate different views on the business.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Bank Statement Matcher
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Algorithm to match Bank Statement Info to Business Partners, Invoices and Payments
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: An algorithm to find Business Partners, Invoices, Payments in imported Bank Statements. The class needs to implement org.compiere.impexp.BankStatementMatcherInterface

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Credit Watch %
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Credit Watch - Percent of Credit Limit when OK switches to Watch
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If Adempiere maintains credit status, the status "Credit OK" is moved to "Credit Watch" if the credit available reaches the percent entered. If not defined, 90% is used.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Info Column
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Column in the Info Window for display and/or selection. If used for selection, the column cannot be a SQL expression. The SQL clause must be fully qualified based on the FROM clause in the Info Window definition

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Query Criteria
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The column is also used as a query criteria
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The column is used to enter queries - the SQL cannot be an expression

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Container Link
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Link to another Container in the Web Project
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Internal Link

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Container Link
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Stage Link to another Container in the Web Project
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Internal Link

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Chat Type
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Chat Type allows you to receive subscriptions for particular content of discussions. It is linked to a table.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Index Query
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Text search query entered

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Index
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Text search index keyword and excerpt across documents

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Excerpt
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: A passage or segment taken from a document,

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Source Updated
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Date the source document was updated

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Index Stop
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Keyword not to be indexed, optional restriced to specific Document Type, Container or Request Type

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Modified
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Indication that the record is modified

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Container Tree
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Container Tree

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Stage Tree
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Stage Tree

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Media Tree
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Media Tree

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Keyword
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Case insensitive keyword for matching. The individual keywords can be separated by space, comma, semicolon, tab or new line. Do not use filler words like "a", "the". At this point, there are NO text search operators like "or" and "and".

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Next Status
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Move to next status automatically after timeout
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: After the timeout, change the status automatically

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Update Status
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Automatically change the status after entry from web
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Change the status automatically after the entry was changed via the Web

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: WebProject Domain
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: This data describes how the different Domains should get handled and how data is forwarded.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Transfer passive
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Should the transfer be run in passive mode?

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Folder
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: A folder on a local or remote system to store data into
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: We store files in folders, especially media files.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Meta RobotsTag
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: RobotsTag defines how search robots should handle this content
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Meta Robots Tag define on how a search engines robot should handle this page and the following ones. It defines two keywords: (NO)INDEX which defines whether or not to index this content and (NO)FOLLOW which defines whether or not to folow links. The most common combination is INDEX,FOLLOW which will force a search robot to index the content and follow links and images.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Meta Content Type
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Defines the type of content i.e. "text/html; charset=UTF-8"
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: With this tag you can overwrite the type of content and how search engines will interpret it. You should keep in mind that this will not influence how the Server and Client interpret the content.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: SerNo Char Start Overwrite
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Serial Number Start Indicator overwrite - default #
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If not defined, the default character # is used

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: SerNo Char End Overwrite
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Serial Number End Indicator overwrite - default empty
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If not defined, no character is used

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Lot Char Start Overwrite
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If not defined, the default character is used

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Lot Char End Overwrite
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If not defined, the default character is used

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Commitment Offset
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Commitment Offset Account is used for posting Commitments and Reservations. It is usually an off-balance sheet and gain-and-loss account.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: LDAP User Name
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: User Name used for authorization via LDAP (directory) services
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Optional LDAP system user name for the user. If not defined, the normal Name of the user is used. This allows to use the internal (LDAP) user id (e.g. jjanke) and the normal display name (e.g. Jorg Janke). The LDAP User Name can also be used without LDAP enables (see system window). This would allow to sign in as jjanke and use the display name of Jorg Janke.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Tax Declaration
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Define the declaration to the tax authorities
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The tax declaration allows you to create supporting information and reconcile the documents with the accounting

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Tax Declaration Line
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The lines are created by the create process. You can delete them if you do not want to include them in a particular declaration.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Tax Declaration Accounting
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Accounting related information for reconcilation with documents. It includes all revenue/expense and tax entries as a base for detail reporting

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Year
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Year identifies the accounting year for a calendar.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Included
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Defines whether this content / template is included into another one
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Templates can be independent or included. Included Templates are also called subtemplates

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Server EMail
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: When selected, mail is sent from the server rather then the client. This decreases availability. You would select this when you do not want to enable email relay for the client addresses in your mail server.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Revenue Recognition Amt
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The amount for revenue recognition calculation. If empty, the complete invoice amount is used. The difference between Revenue Recognition Amount and Invoice Line Net Amount is immediately recognized as revenue.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Container URL
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: We save the info on all used URLs for checking them on availability etc.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Status
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Status of the currently running check
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Status of the currently running check

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Source
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Source of the Issue

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Exclude Lot
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Exclude the ability to create Lots in Attribute Sets

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Exclude SerNo
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Exclude the ability to create Serial Numbers in Attribute Sets

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Account Usage
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Determines how the bank account is used.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Collection Status
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Status of the invoice collection process

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Ldap Processor
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: LDAP Server to authenticate and authorize external systems based on Adempiere
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The LDAP Server allows third party software (e.g. Apache) to use the users defined in the system to authentificate and authorize them. There is only one server per Adempiere system. The "o" is the Client key and the optional "ou" is the Interest Area key.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Ldap Port
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The port the server is listening
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The default LDAP port is 389

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Ldap Access
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Access via LDAP

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Acct Open Dr
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Open Debit in document curreny & rate

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Acct Open Cr
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Open Credit in document curreny & rate

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Acct Open Balance
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Open Balance in document curreny & rate

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Create levels sequentially
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Create Dunning Letter by level sequentially
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If selected, the dunning letters are created in the sequence of the dunning levels. Otherwise, the dunning level is based on the days (over)due.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Show All Due
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The dunning letter with this level incudes all due invoices.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Show Not Due
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Show/print all invoices which are not due (yet).
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The dunning letter with this level incudes all not due invoices.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Credit Stop
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Set the business partner to credit stop
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If a dunning letter of this level is created, the business partner is set to Credit Stop (needs to be manually changed).

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Set Payment Term
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Set the payment term of the Business Partner
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If a dunning letter of this level is created, the payment term of this business partner is overwritten.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Allocate Payment
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: You can directly allocate payments to invoices when creating the Payment. Note that you can over- or under-allocate the payment. When processing the payment, the allocation is created.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Full BP Access
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The user/concat has full access to Business Partner information and resources
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If selected, the user has full access to the Business Partner (BP) information (Business Documents like Orders, Invoices - Requests) or resources (Assets, Downloads). If you deselet it, the user has no access rights unless, you explicitly grant it in tab "BP Access"

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: User Importance
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Priority of the issue for the User

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Jasper Process
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The Jasper Process used by the printengine if any process defined

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Column SQL
AD_ELEMENT.HELP:
You can define virtual columns (not stored in the database). If defined, the Column name is the synonym of the SQL expression defined here. The SQL expression must be valid.
Example: "Updated-Created" would list the age of the entry in days

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Validate current (new) Value
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Ensure that the new value of the change is the current value in the system (i.e. no change since then)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Validate current (old) Value
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Ensure that the old value of the change is the current value in the system (i.e. original situation)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Only Set Customization
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Set Customization for change records records with Dictionary Entity Type

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: IBAN
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If your bank provides an International Bank Account Number, enter it here Details ISO 13616 and http://www.ecbs.org. The account number has the maximum length of 22 characters (without spaces). The IBAN is often printed with a apace after 4 characters. Do not enter the spaces in Adempiere.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Cost Distribution
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: How landed costs are distributed to material receipts

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Meta Publisher
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Meta Publisher defines the publisher of the content
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: As author and publisher must not be the same person this tag saves the responsible publisher for the content

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Meta Author
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Author of the content for the Containers Meta Data

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Line Level
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Level on which Project Lines are maintained

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: One Asset Per UOM
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If selected, one asset per UOM is created, otherwise one asset with the quantity received/shipped. If you have multiple lines, one asset is created per line.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Notification Type
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Emails or Notification sent out for Request Updates, etc.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: BOM Use
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The use of the Bill of Material
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: By default the Master BOM is used, if the alternatives are not defined

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Change Request
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Change requests for a Bill of Materials. They can be automatically created from Requests, if enabled in the Request Type and the Request Group referres to a Bill of Materials

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Private Note
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Private Note - not visible to the other parties

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Landed Cost
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Landed cost to be allocated to material receipts
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Landed costs allow you to allocate costs to previously received material receipts. Examples are freight, excise tax, insurance, etc.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Search Invoice
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Invoice Document.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Search Order
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Order is a control document.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Preference Level
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Determines what preferences the user can set
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Preferences allow you to define default values. If set to None, you cannot set any preference nor value preference. Only if set to Client, you can see the Record Info Change Log.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Overwrite Price Limit
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Overwrite Price Limit if the Price List enforces the Price Limit
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Price List allows to enforce the Price Limit. If set, a user with this role can overwrite the price limit (i.e. enter any price).

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Access all Orgs
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Access all Organizations (no org access control) of the client
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: When selected, the role has access to all organizations of the client automatically. This also increases performance where you have many organizations.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Overwrite Bus.Partner
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Overwrite the account segment Business Partner with the value specified
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If not overwritten, the value of the original account combination is used. If selected, but not specified, the segment is set to null.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Use User Org Access
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Use Org Access defined by user instead of Role Org Access
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: You can define the access to Organization either by Role or by User. You would select this, if you have many organizations.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Campaign Tree
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Tree to determine marketing campaign hierarchy
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Trees are used for (finanial) reporting

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Activity Tree
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Trees are used for (finanial) reporting

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Entity Type
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The entity type determines the ownership of Application Dictionary entries. The types "Dictionary" and "Adempiere" should not be used and are maintainted by Adempiere (i.e. all changes are reversed during migration to the current definition).

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: ModelPackage
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Java Package of the model classes
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: By default, the Java model classes for extensions are in the compiere.model package. If you provide a jar file in the classpath, you can define here your specific model package. The model classes are used to save/modify/delete entries and as well as in Workflow. Refer to the Compiere naming convention to make sure that your class is used rather then the base classes.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Classpath
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If your appplication requires additional jar files, enter them here. The jar files must be located in the $ADEMPIERE_HOME/lib directory.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Info Received
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Information of the receipt of the package (acknowledgement)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Referenced Order
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Reference of the Sales Order Line to the corresponding Purchase Order Line or vice versa.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Distribution Run Line
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Distribution Run Lines define Distribution List, the Product and Quantiries
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The order amount is based on the greater of the minimums of the product or distribution list and the quantity based on the ratio.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: RMA Type
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Types of RMA

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Mandatory Type
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The specification of a Product Attribute Instance is mandatory

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Quantity Reimbursed
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The reimbursed quantity is derived from the entered quantity and can be overwritten when approving the expense report.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: IsPostcodeLookup
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Does this country have a post code web service
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Enable the IsPostcodeLookup if you wish to configure a post code lookup web service

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: LookupClassName
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The class name of the postcode lookup plugin
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Enter the class name of the post code lookup plugin for your postcode web service provider

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: LookupClientID
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The ClientID or Login submitted to the Lookup URL
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Enter the ClientID or Login for your account provided by the post code web service provider

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: LookupUrl
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The URL of the web service that the plugin connects to in order to retrieve postcode data
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Enter the URL of the web service that the plugin connects to in order to retrieve postcode data

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: LookupPassword
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The password submitted to the Lookup URL
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Enter the password for your account provided by the post code web service provider

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Shipment/Receipt
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Material Shipment / Receipt

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Price Invoiced
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: The priced invoiced to the customer (in the currency of the customer's AR price list) - 0 for default price
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The invoiced price is derived from the Invoice Price entered and can be overwritten. If the price is 0, the default price on the customer's invoice is used.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Elements
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Contains list of elements seperated by CR
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Contains a list of elements this template uses seperated by a Carriage Return. Last line should be empty

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Use Ad
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Whether or not this templates uses Ad's
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: This describe whether or not this Template will use Ad's

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: ContainerXML
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Autogenerated Containerdefinition as XML Code

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Indexed
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Index the document for the internal search engine
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: For cross document search, the document can be indexed for faster search (Container, Document Type, Request Type)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Secure content
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Defines whether content needs to get encrypted
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: If you select this parameter this container will only get delivered over a secure connection i.e. SSL etc. if no encryption can be found no content will be delivered

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Notice
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Contains info on what changed with the last write

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Actual Impression Count
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: How many impressions have been counted
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Contains info on the actual impression count until now

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Internal Use Qty
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Internal Use Quantity removed from Inventory
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Quantity of product inventory used internally (positive if taken out - negative if returned)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: RfQ
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Request for Quotation to be sent out to vendors of a RfQ Topic. After Vendor selection, optionally create Sales Order or Quote for Customer as well as Purchase Order for Vendor(s)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Alert Recipient
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: You can send the notifications to users or roles

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Scheduler Recipient
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: You can send the notifications to users or roles

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Modification
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Description of the System modification or extension

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Info Window
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The Info window is used to search and select records as well as display information relevant to the selection.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Max Query Records
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: If defined, you cannot query more records as defined - the query criteria needs to be changed to query less records
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Enter the numer of records a user will be able to query to avoid unnecessary system load. If 0, no restrictions are imposed.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Web Access Profile
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Define access to collaboration management content. You can assign the profile to a internal role or for external access to business partner group.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Media Deploy
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Log of Media Deployments

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: File Size
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Size of the File in bytes

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Statistics
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Information to help profiling the system for solving support issues
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Profile information do not contain sensitive information and are used to support issue detection and diagnostics as well as general anonymous statistics

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Profile
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Information to help profiling the system for solving support issues
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Profile information do not contain sensitive information and are used to support issue detection and diagnostics

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: System Status
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Status of the system - Support priority depends on system status
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: System status helps to prioritize support resources

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Track Issues
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Enable tracking issues for this asset
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Issues created by automatic Error Reporting

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Set Inventory Count to
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Set the value of the inventory count to Zero or On Hand Quantity

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Template
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Template defines how content is displayed
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: A template describes how content should get displayed, it contains layout and maybe also scripts on how to handle the content

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Uses News
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Template or container uses news channels
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: This content (container or template) uses news channels

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: TemplateXST
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Here we include the template code itself

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Size X
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Size of X (horizontal) dimension in Units

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Size Y
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Size of Y (vertical) dimension in Units

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Web Container
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Web Container contains content like images, text etc.
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: A Container defines the abstract level around the content, it defines how the content get's displayed, indexed and stored.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Template Tree
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Template Tree

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Template Table
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Link a Template with a Table

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Chat
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Thread of discussion

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Container T.Table
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Link to individual Record

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Chat Entry
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The entry can not be changed - just the confidentiality

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Stage T.Table
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Link to individual Record

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: External Link (URL)
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: External URL for the Container

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Meta Keywords
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Contains the keywords for the content
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Contains keyword info on the main search words this content is relevant to

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Stylesheet
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Base Stylesheet (.css file) to use - if empty, the default (standard.css) is used. The Style sheet can be a URL.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Final Close
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Entries with Final Close cannot be re-opened

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Position Category
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Classification of Job Positions

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: To Product
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Product to be converted to (must have UOM Conversion defined to From Product)

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Multi Row Only
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: This applies to Multi-Row view only

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: EMail Header
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The header is added to every email.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: EMail Footer
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: The footer is added to every email.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Create New Batch
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: If selected a new batch is created
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Note that the balance check does not check that individual batches are balanced.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Create New Journal
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: If selected a new journal within the batch is created
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: Note that the balance check does not check that individual journals are balanced.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Allow Negative Posting
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Allow to post negative accounting values

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Priority Base
AD_ELEMENT.HELP: When deriving the Priority from Importance, the Base is "added" to the User Importance.

AD_ELEMENT.NAME: Exclude Attribute Set
AD_ELEMENT.DESCRIPTION: Exclude the ability to enter Attribute Sets
